Our Restaurant
Welcome to Fratellino, nestled in the heart of downtown Coral Gables! We take great pride in serving classic Italian cuisine in a warm and inviting atmosphere. As you step through our doors, you'll be enveloped in the comforting aromas of freshly baked bread, simmering sauces, and sizzling sautéed garlic. Our goal is to create a dining experience that feels like coming to a delicious home-cooked meal with your family. While our atmosphere is casual, our service level is anything but. Our friendly and attentive staff is dedicated to ensuring that every guest feels like a member of our extended family. So whether you're joining us for a romantic date night, a family celebration, or simply craving some authentic Italian flavors, we invite you to sit back, relax, and let us take care of you. Buon appetito!
Our Food
Come join us for comfort Italian food recipes that have been passed down through generations within our family. Our dishes are simple yet packed with flavor, bringing you a taste of Italy. From our renowned Ossobuco alla Milanese to Grandma’s Ale Famous Tiramisu, every bite is a taste of tradition and love. We believe that the key to a delicious meal lies in using the freshest ingredients and preparing them with care. Whether you're in the mood for a classic spaghetti carbonara or a hearty bowl of pasta e fagioli, our menu is designed to satisfy your cravings and bring you to Grandma's Ale dining room in Italy. Come and experience the warmth and comfort of our family recipes, where every dish is made with passion and served with a smile.
Private Events
Let us host your next private event! We can work with you in creating a custom menu to cater to your preferences. Whether it's a birthday party, anniversary celebration, or corporate gathering, we have you covered. Our team will work closely with you to ensure every detail is perfect, from the food to the ambiance. Trust us to make your event unforgettable!

About the Business
Tuscan dining destination originating in New York City, FELICE, has just opened its new flagship restaurant, FELICE Brickell, in the heart of Miami's vibrant Brickell neighborhood. FELICE, pronounced "Fe-Lee-Che," also means "happy" in Italian. The essence of the eatery is to serve its guests through the concept's family-oriented approach to Tuscan-inspired cuisine.

OUR MENU
Over 70 Signature Italian Dishes to Delight your Senses

★ DIVIETO POLPO
Tender marinated octopus grilled to perfection, served over roasted potatoes, peppers, and red onion, garnished with spicy mayonnaise and an emulsion of EVOO and fresh herbs. 24.95
$24.95
Gluten free
CARPACCIO DI MANZO
Thinly sliced beef topped with fresh mushrooms, arugula and shaved Parmesan cheese, drizzled with white truffle oil.  Served with focaccia bread.  20.95
ANTIPASTO MISTO
Prosciutto, hot capicola, soppressata, coppa, asiago, and Parmigiano Reggiano cheese. Served with marinated mixed olives, fig marmalade, and focaccia bread.  34.50
CALAMARI FRITTI
Fried calamari, zucchini and yellow squash. Served with spicy pomodoro and garlic aioli sauce.  19.95.    Add shrimp  7
SPINACH FORMAGGIO
A creamy dip made with spinach and artichoke hearts, blended with a mixture of cheeses. Served with garlic bread.  17.50
TUNA TARTARE
An impressive tower of freshly diced sushi-grade tuna, topped with a Mediterranean tapenade – mix of chopped olives, capers, and shallots – served with an emulsion of EVOO with fresh herbs and focaccia bread.  21
EGGPLANT BURRATA
Crispy beer-battered eggplant slices topped with savory pomodoro sauce, creamy burrata cheese, a drizzle of basil-infused oil, crispy prosciutto, and a sprinkle of Parmigiano Reggiano. A rich, flavorful twist on a classic!  22.
MUSSELS MARINARA
Sautéed in a spicy pomodoro sauce. Served with garlic bread.  19.95
BURRATA
Creamy fresh mozzarella cheese served over a bed of arugula, with cherry tomatoes, drizzled with a basil-infused oil and a balsamic glaze. Served with focaccia bread.  17.95.  Add prosciutto 7.50
BRUSCHETTA SICILIANA

PIZZA

Our homemade pizza sauce is blended with Parmesan cheese. 
Pizzas available Gluten Free
★ DIVIETO

NONO'S EXTRAVAGANZA
Pepperoni, hot capicola, mild Italian sausage, mushrooms, roasted peppers, red onions and mozzarella cheese.  23.95
TOSCANA
Mozzarella and ricotta cheese, grilled chicken, spinach, mushrooms and fresh basil. Drizzled with white truffle oil. 23.95

name: Contessa Miami
raw_text:
Contessa Ristorante Miami – Italian Restaurant
Skip to content
About
Menu
Locations
Hours & Info
Reserve The Holidays
Catering
Events
RESERVE A TABLE
Miami
Scroll to next section
The glamorous, all-day trattoria located in Miami's design district the city's most elegant yet energetic neighborhood, welcome guests to eat, drink, celebrate, see and be seen well into the night.
ABOUT
A sophisticated ode to the cuisine of Northern Italy, Contessa debuted in the Miami Design District in 2022 with a wealth of lush design accents that evoke Lake Como. The two-story space with its spectacular alfresco terrace, pink-hued bar and collection of magnificent framed mirrors, nods to the high fashion of the famed neighborhood.
THE CUISINE
The menu’s classics include Piemontese carpaccio, feasts of antipasti, signature pizzas, tortellini en brodo, and traditional bistecca Fiorentina. As for the wine list, Boston Magazine described it as “a Nebbiolo nerd’s cherry-toned, vertical-vintage playground—deep and dreamy.”
MENU
BRUNCH
LUNCH & DINNER
LUNCH SPECIALS
PRIX-FIXE LUNCH
DESSERT
COCKTAILS
WINES BY THE GLASS
Select a Menu
THE EXPERIENCE
Bright, airy, and effortlessly refined, Contessa is a restaurant suited to everything from a beautiful breakfast in the sun to an unforgettable Italian feast or perhaps a perfect spritz following a day of luxury shopping.
MAJOR FOOD GROUP
Founded a decade ago by Jeff Zalaznick, Chef Mario Carbone, and Chef Rich Torrisi, Major Food Group has consistently delivered the most celebrated, innovative, and exciting culinary experiences in the world. Together, the three visionary leaders deliver exceptional, delicious food and hospitality concepts that delight guests, define categories and, while creating distinguishable sense of place in every city, establish new standards for the industry.
While each brand this creative team brings to life is distinct, they all reflect MFG’s refined, celebratory, and thoroughly contemporary approach to its craft.
JOIN OUR NEWSLETTER
Sign up to hear about exciting new updates from Contessa and Major Food Group.
NEWS
ELLE
ELLE Escapes: Miami
Eater
Behold Contessa, the Glamorous Northern Italian Outpost From Major Food Group
Miami Herald
This luxurious Italian restaurant, a magnet for Boston foodies, just opened in Miami

Major Food Group Opens Contessa in Design District

Cèrto, located in Coral Gables, Florida, offers a diverse menu of Italian-inspired dishes, blending classic and modern flavors. Their offerings include homemade pastas, wood-fired Neapolitan and New York-style pizzas, and a variety of seafood and meat dishes. The restaurant is recognized for its high-quality ingredients and exceptional service, providing a welcoming atmosphere for all guests.
Menu Highlights:
Antipasti:
Start your meal with options like Fritto Misto, featuring calamari, shrimp, and zucchini served with homemade tomato sauce, or Burrata e Prosciutto, combining creamy burrata with 18-month aged prosciutto di Parma.
Wood-Fired Appetizers:
Enjoy dishes such as Polipo Alla Legna, wood oven-roasted octopus with a mildly spicy herb oil, and Focaccia Classica, topped with diced tomatoes, homemade mozzarella, basil, and olive oil.
Pasta and Risotto:
Indulge in homemade pastas like Fettuccine Bolognese, prepared with veal and beef ragu in a pink sauce, or Risotto Con Funghi, Italian rice cooked with mushrooms, white wine, unsalted butter, and Parmigiano Reggiano.
Pizzas:
Choose between Neapolitan-style pizzas, such as the Margherita with fresh mozzarella and chunky tomato sauce, and New York-style options like the classic NY Cheese Pizza.
Main Courses:
Savor entrees like Pollo Alla Parmigiana, baked breaded chicken breast in tomato sauce topped with melted mozzarella, and Salmone Al Pinot Grigio, oven-roasted Alaskan salmon filet with white wine and fresh herbs.
Cèrto also offers a selection of salads, soups, and charcuterie boards, ensuring a well-rounded dining experience. For younger guests, a dedicated kids’ menu is available. The restaurant provides various dining options, including lunch, brunch, and catering services, along with promotions like executive lunch discounts and happy hour specials.
Experience the authentic flavors of Italy in the heart of Coral Gables at Cèrto, where culinary excellence meets a warm and inviting atmosphere.
Host Your Private Event at Certo
Looking for the perfect venue for your next private event?
Certo Miami offers an elegant and welcoming space to celebrate life’s special moments.
• Customizable Menus:
Work with our team to create a menu tailored to your tastes and dietary needs.
• Ideal for Any Occasion:
From corporate lunches to birthday celebrations, our venue is perfect for events of all sizes.
• Exceptional Service:
Our experienced staff will ensure your event is seamless and memorable.
• Convenient Location:
Located in the heart of Miami,
Certo Miami
is easy to access for all your guests.
Let us handle the details while you enjoy a stress-free and unforgettable event. Contact us today to learn more about our private dining options or to book your event.

About the Business
At Casa Tua Cucina, 18,000 square feet of bustling open kitchens, sleek, modern dining space, and heartfelt culinary passion, we invite you to discover and enjoy the finest in handcrafted Italian cuisine. Complete with a pizzeria, pasta station, grill station, bakery, pastry station, cafe, and more, we prepare and serve an impressive selection of both classic and contemporary dishes, all perfectly complemented by our extensive wine list and beautiful craft cocktails. And while our fare is indeed quite fancy, our dining space is casual, energized, and fun -- the perfect spot for a quick meal between meetings, a leisurely gal's brunch, or a celebratory dinner with the family. It's casual fine dining at its finest and most casual, and we can't wait to share it with you.

EXPLORE OUR MENU
Embark on a culinary journey that celebrates the vibrant flavors of Italy at Capriccio. Our menu is a canvas painted with the rich traditions and artistry of Italian gastronomy. From the moment you peruse our offerings, you'll discover a symphony of tastes that evoke the spirit of "Mangia bene, ridi spesso, ama molto."
Appetizers
FRIED CALAMARI
Crisp to perfection served with zucchini and marinara sauce.
CHEESE TEQUEÑO
Served with house aioli (5 pcs).
TRUFFLE FRIES
BURRATA GUAVA
Guava sauce, ground biscuit, pistacchio, crackers.
CARPACCIO Di MANZO
Served arugula, shaved parm and lemon.
BURRATA TOMACA
Over fresh tomato, olive oil, salt & pepper.
VITELLO TONNATO
Roasted veal, capers, arugula, tomato and tuna
OCTOPUS CARPACCIO
Served with fennel salad, capers, shallots and lemon.
BURRATA e' MORTADELLA FOCACCIA
Perfect DUO with a touch of rosemary
(change to prosciutto for $2).
SALUMERIA MISTA
Prosciutto, mortadella, coppa, parmigiano reggiano,
caponata, artichokes, fig spread.
Salads
DEL BOSCO
Mixed greens, fresh strawberry, balsamic pears, dry apricots, candied walnuts and gorgonzola cheese with creamy balsamic berry vinaigrette.
MEDITERRANEA
Romaine lettuce, Roma tomato, red peppers, red onion, cucumber, black olives, artichokes, chick peas and feta cheese with Greek vinaigrette.
FRASCATI
Romaine, chicken, grapes, candied walnuts, apples, gorgonzola cheese and celery in balsamic vinaigrette.
ASIANA
Mixed greens, mandarin segments, Roma tomato, crispy noodles, cabbage, carrots, sliced toasted almonds and grilled chicken with sesame ginger dressing.
STRACCIATELLA
Romaine, spinach, ham, chicken, corn, bacon, gorgonzola, tomato in aioli.
CLASSIC CESAR
Romaine lettuce, crispy bacon, shaved parmesan and croutons with Cesar dressing.
VOLCANO
Mixed greens, pineapple, mandarin, chick peas, cabbage, red peppers, sesame seeds, shaved almonds, cucumber, feta cheese, corn and hot chicken breast.
TUNA TATAKI
Served with sesame seeds and Asiana.
Unless you are a pizza
the answer is yes,
I can live without you.
- Bill Murray -
Pizza 12"/18"
TRADIZIONALE
House rosso sauce and mozzarella.
BROOKLYN
Artisanal NY pepperoni with signature red sauce and mozzarella.
L’AMERICANO
Italian sausage, Parmacotto ham, pancetta, shallots, Brooklyn pepperoni.
RUSTICANA
Parmacotto ham, mushrooms, mozzarella, fontina cheese, red sauce and roasted peppers.
MORETTI
Stracciatella, mortadella, mozzarella and pistachio.
QUATTRO FORMAGGI
Gorgonzola, provolone, mozzarella and fontina topped with balsamic pears and crushed walnuts.
PIZZA TRUFFLE
Mushroom and truffle puree, mozzarella, parmacotto ham and arugula.
PIZZA ROMA
Fresh tomato, pesto, basil, mozzarella and stracciatella.
SAN DANIELLE
Arugula, prosciutto, shaved parmigiano, cherry tomato with red sauce.
CALABRESSE
Tomato sauce, mozzarella, arugula, prosciutto, mortadella, burrata, cherry tomatoes.
PIZZA PARMA
Tomato sauce, mozzarella, gorgonzola, caramelized onions, arugula and coppa.
PIZZA BIANCA
Eggplant, mozzarella, fontina, spinach, choice of prosciutto or italian sausage.
PIZZA FIG.
Bianca, fig Spread, mozzarella, graded Parm, prosciutto & granulated biscotti.
Life is a Combination of
Magic and Pasta.
Pasta
MEAT LASAGNA
Made with our signature all beef red sauce
PENNE PINK BOLOGNA
All beef sauce with cream and parmigiano.
GNOCCHI ALLA CHECCA
Fresh tomato, basil, fresh mozzarella in garlic and olive oil.
PAPARDELLE MUSHROOM
Served with truffe cream sauce, add stracciatella +5.
SHORT RIB RAVIOLI
With pomodoro sauce.
PORTOBELLO RAVIOLI
Roma tomatoes, fresh basil, white wine, garlic topped with fresh arugula.
FIG RAVIOLI
With gorgonzola sauce, arugula and biscotti crumbs.
PACCHERI SALMONE
With zucchini and sundried tomato.
FIOCHETTI PEAR & CHEESE
Stuffed pasta with gorgonzola sauce and walnuts.
GNOCCHI PISTACHIO PESTO
Topped with prosciutto.
GNOCCHI TENDERLOIN
Served with mushrooms and beef with white wine sauce.
SPAGUETTI VONGOLE
Clams in white wine garlic sauce.
SPAGHETTI DiMARE
Clams, mussels, shrimp and calamari with fresh tomato.
PACCHERI RAGU
Short rib slow cook recipe and stracciatella .
CARTOCCIO TENDERLOIN
Served with penne Vodka.
Rustic Bread
CAPRI
Prosciutto, fresh mozzarella, Roma tomato, fresh basil.
CAPRICCIO
Grilled chicken, roasted peppers, provolone cheese and house pesto.
BISTECCA
Seared thin sliced rib eye, provolone, tomato, caramelized onions, arugula.
MILANO
Breaded Beef Milanese topped with parsley cioppino salad
AUTOGRILL
Eggplant, prosciutto, fresh mozzarella, caramelized onions, arugula & roasted peppers.
STEAK, PEPPERS AND CHEESE
Seared thin sliced rib eye with peppers and onions with provolone.
MUCCA
Tenderloin, shredded mozzarella, potato stixs, arugula and cilantro aioli.
BRONX
Cotto ham, prosciutto, mortadella and provolone.
TENDERLOIN PANINO
Seared tenderloin with stracciatella and tomaca with arugula.
From Our Kitchen
CHICKEN CAPRESA
Sliced tomato & fresh mozzarella over arugula topped with pesto.
CHICKEN PARADISO
Served seasonal vegetables and roasted sweet potato.
CHICKEN PARMIGIANO
Served with penne pomodoro.
BEEF MILANESE
Served with roasted potatoes and arugula salad.
NY STEAK
16oz Black Angus steak served with Truffle fries and arugula salad.
SALMONE ARANCIO
Baked salmon served over roasted vegetables in mandarin ginger sauce.
EGGPLANT PARMIGIANO
Fresh grilled eggplant, tomato sauce and parmigiana topped with melted provolone.
EGGPLANT ROLLETINI
Fresh grilled eggplant rolls filled with ricotta & spinach, tomato sauce, parm cheese & melted provolone.
CIOPPINO DI PESCE
Fish broth with clams, mussels, shrimps, calamari and catch of the day.
NY STEAK SIGNATURE
Served with pacheri with creamy portobello Truffle sauce.
Risotto
RISOTTO FUNGHI
Mixed seasonal mushroom with truffle oil.
SALMONE RISOTTO
With zucchini and sundried tomato.
BEEF RISOTTO
Tenderloin, fresh mushrooms and truffle oil.
DiMARE RISOTTO
Clams, mussels, shrimp, calamari and fresh tomato.
MANGIA BENE
RIDI SPESSO
AMA MOLTO
MANGIA QUESTO

Antipasti
Appetizer
Bruschetta Classica
$9
Slices of our wood-fired toasted Italian Focaccia, topped with ripe diced tomatoes, marinated in garlic, basil and extra virgin olive oil
Bruschetta di Burrata e Pomodorini
$14
Slices of our wood-fired toasted Italian Focaccia bread, topped with a creamy burrata cheese and baked cherry tomatoes.
Gamberi Aglio-Peperoncino
$16
Peeled shrimp sauteéd with garlic, olive oil and crushed hot pepper.
Burrata e Prosciutto di Parma
$19
Locally sourced soft centered Mozzarella cheese, 24 months naturally aged imported prosciutto, extra virgin olive oil.
Antipasto Il Forno
$32
Delightful assortment of italian cured meats and cheeses, complemented by a Dalmatia Fig Jam, and aromatic rosemary focaccia, freshly baked in our wood-fired oven.
Arancina Siciliana
$14
Golden-fried rice ball, filled with a savory ragù of ground beef and peas. A classic Sicilian specialty, crispy on the outside and tender on the inside.
Polpo D'Oro
$19
Slow-braised Cantabrian Octopus, seared to a crisp and served on a bed of wild arugula with a lemon dressing. Accompanied by our unique sundried tomatoes and sweet paprika aioli.
Polpo al Limone con Patate
$19
Poached Cantabrian octopus sautéed with  garlic, olive oil and potatoes in a lemon sauce..
Fritto Misto
$23
Fried Calamari, shrimp, diced fish and zucchini in our special batter.
Portobello con Mozzarella  al Forno
$16
Wood-fire roasted Portobello mushroom, topped with roasted pepper, pesto, gorgonzola and mozzarella cheese.
Parmigiana di Melenzane
$16
Breaded eggplant steaks, deep fried and then finished in the oven with our pomodoro sauce, fresh Italian mozzarella and aged imported parmigiano cheese.
Crudi
Raw Bar
* Carpaccio alla Cipriani
$14
Thin slices of raw beef served with emulsion of Dijon mustard, arugula, fried capers and Parmigiano Reggiano cheese.
* Carpaccio di Polpo
$14
Thin slices of tender Cantabrian octopus           with extra virgin olive oil.
* Carpaccio di Salmone
$14
Thin slices of North Atlantic salmon served with extra virgin olive oil.
* Tartare di Tonno
$21
Hand-chopped fresh tuna with avocado, toasted sesame seeds, spicy sesame oil, a pinch of finely chopped red onion, lime & cilantro, served chilled with our own wasabi aioli sauce.
*
Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs may increase your risk of food borne illness, especially if you have certain medical conditions.
Zuppe
Soups
Zuppa del Giorno
$9
Soup of the day
(Monday to Friday)
Pasta e Fagioli
$15
Canellini bean soup with datalini pasta, prosciuto crudo di Parma, onions, garlic and a touch of tomatoes.
Insalate
Salads
Insalata di Rucola
$18
Fresh arugula, strawberries, and toasted almonds, topped with shaved Parmigiano Reggiano, drizzled with balsamic vinegar and extra virgin olive oil..
- Add grilled chicken  7
- Add grilled shrimp  9
Insalata Caesar
$17
* Crisp romaine lettuce, croutons, and savory Parmigiano Reggiano cheese, tossed in our signature Caesar dressing.
- Add grilled chicken   7   
- Add grilled shrimp   9
Insalata di Avocado
$17
Avocado, sliced tomatoes, and red onions on a bed of mixed greens with homemade vinaigrette.
- Add grilled chicken   7    
- Add grilled shrimp   9
Insalata Caprese
$17
Ripe tomatoes, fresh Fior di Latte Mozzarella cheese, basil leaves, drizzled with extra virgin olive oil, pesto and balsamic reduction.
- Add Prosciutto di Parma   9
Mista di Stagione della Casa
$14
Mixed greens with tomatoes, tossed with                                      our homemade Vinaigrette.
- Add grilled chicken   7   - Add grilled shrimp   9
Imported  Italian  Dry  Pasta
“Gluten Free Pasta available. Ask your server”
Rigatoni “IL FORNO”
$26
Beef stuffed pasta with Prosciutto di Parma, green peas in a light cream sauce.
Linguine alle Vongole
$25
Fresh clams, garlic and parsley in a white wine sauce with a touch of extra virgin olive oil.
Linguine ai Sette Mari
$32
Fresh squid, shrimp, mussels, clams, and diced fish sautéed with garlic, finished in a fragrant fresh marinara with a touch of lobster bisque.
Risotti
"Sorry, no sides or half portions available"
Risotto Piemontese al Tartufo
$29
Arborio rice slowly cooked with sautéed porcini and wild mushrooms, finished in a brandy and rosemary reduction, enhanced with white truffle oil.
Risotto ai Frutti di Mare
$34
Creamy Arborio rice slowly cooked in a rich lobster fumé, with fresh clams, mussels, squid, and shrimp, finished with a touch of garlic butter and fresh parsley.
*
Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs may increase your risk of food borne illness, especially if you have certain medical conditions.
Artisanal  Pasta
Fettuccine ai Due Tartufi
$33
Italian Black Truffle and 32 months aged Parmigiano sauce with Alba White Truffle infused oil, and shaved truffle carpaccio.
Mezzi Rigatoni Cacio e Pepe
$24
Ancient Roman dish consisting of thick hollow pasta, tosed with flavorful sauce made from imported Pecorino Romano cheese, and toasted black pepper .
Ravioli di Pere
$29
Square ravioli stuffed with Ricotta cheese and pear, served with pine nuts and Gorgonzola  sauce with a touch of balsamic glazed.
Ravioli di Granchio
36
Handmade squid ink ravioli filled with Alaskan king  crab, served in a delicate pink sauce with rainbow  tomato confit, wilted arugula, spring onion segments  and  salmon caviar.
Fettuccine alla Bolognese
$26
Ground Black Angus Beef slowly cooked in a                        reduction of Merlot wine & tomato sauce.
Agnolotti alla Toscana
$26
Round ravioli filled with spinach & ricotta cheese, served with fresh basil & fresh tomato sauce.

name: O Munaciello Coral Way
raw_text:
'O Munaciello Coral Way - Authentic Italian Restaurant & Neapolitan Pizza
(305) 639 8298
2250 Coral Way, Miami, FL 33145
LOCATIONS
DELIVERY & TAKEAWAY
FIND A TABLE
LOCATIONS
DELIVERY & TAKEAWAY
FIND A TABLE
DELIVERY & TAKEAWAY
FIND A TABLE
(305) 639 8298
2250 Coral Way, Miami, FL 33145
CORAL WAY
TRUE NEAPOLITAN PIZZA,
IN THE HEART OF MIAMI
DELIVERY
MENU
WHERE WE ARE
Coral Way is a traditional Florida neighborhood with architecture reflecting the early 20th century.
Our Neapolitan pizza restaurant is located at 2250 Coral Way in Miami.
We are famed Italian restaurant from Florence, Italy coming to Miami in January 2017.
FIND US
THE BEST ITALIAN FOOD
THE LOVE OF PIZZA AND ITALIAN STYLE.
We personally select the best Italian ingredients from our trusted suppliers to put all the true taste of the Bel Paese on your plate. Just as our master pizza makers and chefs are also Italian.
DISCOVER OUR MENU
DELIVERY
THE CULTURE OF PIZZA VERACE
We were the first to bring true Neapolitan pizza to Florence. The one with the high crust, the dough leavened for 48 hours and baked only in a wood-fired oven. It was 2005 and for Florentines it was a novelty. Today ‘O Munaciello is a solid reality and loved by the whole city, as well as by tourists.
ORDER ONLINE

ANTIPASTI/APPETIZERS
Start your meal with our handpicked selection of Italian-inspired appetizers. From timeless classics to creative bites, each dish is crafted with fresh, high-quality ingredients and a passion for authentic flavors. Whether you’re sharing with friends or enjoying a taste for yourself, our starters set the perfect tone for what’s to come.

PASTA, PASTA RIPIENA & RISOTTI
Savor the heart of the meal with our expertly crafted main courses. Each dish is a celebration of rich flavors and culinary tradition, blending seasonal ingredients with inspired techniques. From hearty favorites to refined specialties, our mains offer something for every palate perfectly balanced, beautifully presented, and made to satisfy.
Signature Dishes
RIGATONI TRE POMODORI
–

and blended with carrots.

HELEN'S
Helen's is all the dope wine you are going to have with dinner!
We offer a range of wines by the glass at each Jon & Vinny's location that change regularly and are listed on the food menu. We also offer a selection of beer and non-alcoholic drinks. We always have sparkling, white, orange, rose & red. Each location has an expansive wine list as well that includes domestic, French, Italian, German, Austrian, South American and Spanish wines to name a few.
When you dine at Jon & Vinny's your server will ask if you want to speak with a Somm, and the Somm can help you navigate our by the glass options, as well as pick out a bottle of wine for the table.
Since each location has a slightly different list and our selection changes frequently, please email
info@helenswines.com
if you want to see what we have.
50 corkage fee per bottle, 2 bottle limit per table, bottles on our wine list (same wine and same vintage) are not allowed.

name: Carbone Vino
raw_text:
Carbone Vino | Coconut Grove
Skip to content
Locations
Menu
About
Hours & Info
Events
Reserve the Holidays
Reserve a Table
Coconut Grove
Scroll to next section
A restaurant created by Major Food Group, CARBONE VINO brings the CARBONE brand’s famed Italian cuisine and iconic atmosphere to the heart of Coconut Grove, along with an array of exciting features unique to this location.
We’ve tried to create something truly special for Coconut Grove: a restaurant that delivers the quintessential CARBONE experience while sharing wonderful new recipes that draw on years of refinement and our ongoing love affair with Italian cuisine. I hope to become a regular at CARBONE VINO, and I have a feeling that many others will, too.
—Chef & MFG Co-Founder, Mario Carbone
ABOUT
Located in the heart of Coconut Grove, CARBONE VINO presents all of the legendary restaurant brand’s signature dishes, a collection of exceptional new additions to the repertoire, and a dynamic beverage program that gives guests the opportunity to enjoy fine and rare wines by the glass. Adding to the concept’s appeal is a world-class bar that serves the complete menu and welcomes walk-ins—because CARBONE VINO was designed to be the kind of restaurant that diners can visit time and time again.
MACARONI
The menu boasts several new macaroni selections by Chef Mario Carbone, like Pumpkin Agnolotti, Tortellini with Truffles, and Spaghettini Bambini, an elevated ode to the buttered noodles Italian children grow up eating, prepared here with grass-fed butter and a coveted aged Parmigiano Reggiano. All of our macaroni is crafted in-house daily.
MENU
DINNER
LUNCH
DESSERT
COCKTAILS
WINE BY THE GLASS
WINE LIST
Select a Menu
Guests are invited to indulge in a remarkable beverage program that features an ever-changing menu of iconic wines by-the-glass, culled from our 3,000-bottle cellar. With over 600 selections, the list allows diners to try something new (and extraordinary) on every visit.
A VINO SWEET HALLMARK
Take a moment to savor a Cannoli Sundae, prepared with homemade cannoli-flavored soft serve and all the classic cannoli garnishes, including chopped pistachios, chocolate bits, and fresh-fried cannoli-shell.
JOIN OUR NEWSLETTER
Sign up to hear about exciting new updates from Carbone Vino and Major Food Group.
MAJOR FOOD GROUP
Founded a decade ago by Jeff Zalaznick, Chef Mario Carbone, and Chef Rich Torrisi, Major Food Group has consistently delivered the most celebrated, innovative, and exciting culinary experiences in the world. Together, the three visionary leaders deliver exceptional, delicious food and hospitality concepts that delight guests, define categories and, while creating distinguishable sense of place in every city, establish new standards for the industry.
While each brand this creative team brings to life is distinct, they all reflect MFG’s refined, celebratory, and thoroughly contemporary approach to its craft.
NEWS
‎ From the Man Behind Carbone Comes a New Must-Visit Spot In Miami
‎Mario Carbone Reflects on 10 Years of Carbone With Assouline Book, New Miami Opening
‎ Major Food Group Expands Its Footprint With CARBONE Vino
‎Vino Carbone Miami is Major Food Group's Next Hot New Restaurant
Carbone Vino Coconut Grove

RESERVATIONS
Mediterranean & Asian Fusion Rooftop Restaurant in Miami
Welcome to a place where celebrating and dining seamlessly merge into one unique experience.
The distinctively curated rooftop space pays homage to the simple spirit of Cycladic design, fused with Wabi-Sabi inspired details. MILA's cuisine is inspired by Asian and Mediterranean eating practices, both healthful and tasteful, embracing the importance of enjoying life.
The kitchen, under the helm of 26-times Michelin awarded Chef Michaël Michaelidis, and Corporate Chef Joshua Walls, aims to take guests on a culinary journey through the shores of the Mediterranean and Japan while creating a creative expression of flavorful MediterrAsian cuisine.
Dishes are served in the informal izakaya dining style, meaning they are meant to be shared at the table, in an energetic setting, paired with theatrical tableside preparations.

If you have chronic illness of the liver, stomach or blood or have immune disorders, you are at greater risk of serious illness from raw oysters and should eat oysters fully cooked. If unsure of your risk, consult a physician. 20% service charge will be added for your convenience. 22% service charge will be added for parties of 6 or more.

About the Business
Business owner information
Stefano M.
Business Owner
Cacio e Pepe Italian Restaurant offers traditional Italian specialities, antipasto, pasta, pesce e carne or fish and meat dishes made from the high-quality authentic ingredients paired with fine wine from our extensive wine list while you enjoy in our indoor cozy, rustic ambience or relax on our outdoor patio. It's truly Italian culinary experience.

Our menu
"Life is a combination of magic and pasta"
- Federico Fellini
At Macchialina, that magic extends beyond the pasta bowl. It lives in the handmade tagliatelle, the deep reds and crisp whites, the way a good glass of wine brings everything together. Our kitchen, led by Chef Michael Pirolo, honors the traditions of rustic Italian cooking with a modern, seasonal twist, crafting award-winning pastas from the highest quality ingredients and pairing them with a thoughtful selection of wines that speak the same language.
Explore both sides of the experience.

Print Menu
About Us
Pummarola is an authentic Neapolitan pizzeria. We serve pizza, pasta, sandwiches, salads, sides, and dessert, based on the original recipes of our dear Nonna Rosa. Our pizza is baked to perfection in our wood-fired ovens, built and imported from Naples, Italy, to achieve the authentic, fire-kissed flavor of home. Our fresh ingredients are also imported from Italy, from the savory plum tomatoes in our marinara sauce, to the Polselli flour in our dough. At Pummarola, we strive to create delicious meals and memorable experiences. Order online today for delivery, takeout, or curbside pickup!

What Is a Group Order?
Now you can place orders easily with your friends, family, and coworkers.
With group ordering, you can create one order as the host, and then share a link to that order with a group of people. Your guests can then add their choices to the order. Everyone will be able to see the order in real-time. As the host, you can also set a spend limit for your guests.
Once everyone has ordered, it is the host's responsbility to complete the order and make the final payment. The order will then be sent through all at once.

2,000 calories a day is used for general nutrition advice, but calorie needs vary. Additional nutrition information is available upon request.
cal represents calories
With the guidance of registered dietitians, we have prepared this menu based on the most current information available from our suppliers and their stated absence of gluten within these items. Please be aware that because our dishes are prepared-to-order, during normal kitchen operations, individual foods may come into contact with one another due to shared cooking and preparation areas. Thus we cannot guarantee that cross-contact with foods containing gluten will not occur. We encourage you to carefully consider your dining choices and your individual dietary needs when dining with us. When placing your order, please let your server know that you are ordering a gluten-free menu item.
*Consuming raw or undercooked meats (such as rare/medium rare), poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness, especially if you have certain medical conditions; these items may contain raw or undercooked ingredients.
**Item contains or may contain nuts.

Menu

APPETIZERS
CRAB PANZANELLA
Jumbo lump crab, combined with crunchy brioche croutons, sweet heirloom cherry tomato, cucumber, tossed in a red wine vinaigrette arugula aioli.
FRITTO MISTO DI MARE
A crispy medley of lightly fried calamari, shrimp,
baby smelt, zucchini, and yellow squash, served with side of spicy aioli and fresh lemon.
VONGOLE E COZZE SFUMATE AL GRECO DI TUFO
Sauteed mussels and clams in a fragrant broth of cherry tomato, parsley, accompanied by crispy garlic crostini.
POLPO ARROSTO ALLA PUTTANESCA
Grilled Mediterranean octopus served with yuca fried,
a velvety potato cream, capers and Taggiasca olives.
WAGYU CARPACCIO BAIA BLU
Tender slice of premium Wagyu beef, with wild mushrooms, a fragrant truffle vinaigrette, moliterno pecorino cheese and seasonal summer truffles.
LA CAPRESE
Imported buffalo mozzarella, marinated heirloom tomatoes, fresh oregano, basil oil. Finished with a drizzle of premium extra virgin olive oil.
BAKED EGGPLANT PARMIGIANA
Thinly sliced eggplant with tomato sauce, fresh basil
and mozzarella cheese, all baked and topped
with parmigiano reggiano.
INSALATE E ZUPPE
BAIABLU SALAD
Tricolor quinoa, farro, baby lentil, frisee, arugula, avocado, olive oil and roasted lemon dressing.
ARTICHOKES & AVOCADO
Julienne artichokes served with avocado, frisee, shaved Parmesan cheese, tossed in a Zesty Cilantro -lime vinaigrette.
INSALATA AMALFI
A colorful combination of red and yellow beats, baby field greens, frisee shaved garden vegetables, topped with roasted corn and goat cheese. Dressed with red wine vinaigrette.
CEASAR SALAD
Romaine lettuce, croutons, shaved parmesan cheese, ceasar dressing.
ZUPPA DEL GIORNO
Soup of the day.
I CRUDI
TUNA TARTARE **
Ahi Tuna, finely diced and tossed with avocado,
shallots and Agrumato lemon olive oil.
Served with mango chutney and crispy avocado bread.
CRUDO DI PESCE DEL GIORNO**
Fresh raw fish of the day, delicately marinated with lemon and dressed in a fresh herb vinaigrette.
SALMONE CARPACCIO **
Thinly sliced Scottish salmon, orange and grapefruit citrus marinade, dill, frisee dressed with lemon juice and extra virgin olive oil.
DAILY SELECTION OF OYSTERS **
A rotating selection of premium oysters
served with a trio of accompaniments: Prosecco Mignonette, horseradish and classic cocktail sauce.
SEAFOOD TOWER ** ( 2 People )
A stunning presentation of the ocean’s finest, Oyster, Clams, Prawn cocktail, langostinos, Scottish salmon, Chilian king crab, 10gr Calvisius Osetra Caviar. Served with brioche and an assortment of accoutrements.
**There is risk associated with consuming raw oysters. If you have chronic illness of the liver, stomach or blood, or have immune disorders, you are at greater risk of serious illness from raw oysters, and should eat oysters fully cooked. If unsure of your risk, consult a physician.
**Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness, especially if you have certain medical conditions.
Sfizi
&
Salumeria
TRUFFLE ARANCINI
Golden-fried Acquarello rice, balls, stuffed with summer truffle and parmesan cheese.
BRUSCHETTA DELIZIOSA
Crispy toasted bread topped with savory Culatello
and creamy buffalo stracciatella cheese.
FIORI DI ZUCCA
Stuffed zucchini blossom with goat cheese and truffle honey.
IL TAGLIERE
A selection of premium Imported and domestic charcuterie served with olives and marinated artichokes, focaccia.
IL TAGLIERE CON FORMAGGI
A combination of fine charcuterie and artisanal cheese, paired with olives, marinated artichokes, focaccia
and sweet honey.
PROSCIUTTO DI PARMA E BURRATA PUGLIESE
Thinly sliced 36-month-aged Prosciutto Parma,
served with burrata cheese from Puglia.
Paste
LINGUINE ALL’ ARAGOSTA
Tender Linguine pasta served with half a maine lobster, cherry tomato and fresh basil.
SPAGHETTI ALLE VONGOLE
Classic Spaghetti sauteed with little neck clams, garlic, crushed red peppers and parsley.
GNOCCHI ALLA “PORTOFINO”
Home made Gnocchi with shrimp, sweet cherry tomato and Basil pesto.
SPAGHETTI ALLA CHITARRA “NERANO”
Handmade Spaghetti paired with baby zucchini, parmigiano, basil and DOP provolone del monaco.
PAPPARDELLE AL RAGU BOLOGNESE
House made Pappardelle pasta, generously coated in a slow-cooked beef and veal ragu made with San Marzano tomatoes.
RAVIOLI ALLA CAPRESE
Handmade Ravioli filled with soft caciotta cheese and maggiorana dressed with a delicate datterini tomato and basil sauce.
PEAR & GORGONZOLA AGNOLOTTI
Handmade Agnolotti filled with sweet pear and tangy gorgonzola, served with a cheese fondue, black truffle and parmesan.
LASAGNA DELLA MAMMA
Layers Homemade egg pasta, slow-cooked bolognese sauce, creamy bechamel, mozzarella and Parmigiano Reggiano.
TONNARELLI CACIO E PEPE
Fresh Tonnarelli pasta tossed with a velvety sauce made with Pecorino cheese, finished with freshly cracked black peppers.
FUSILLI DI GRAGNANO AI TRE POMODORI
Fusilli Pasta, served with three kinds of tomatoes : Datterino, San Marzano and yellow cherry tomato, Parmesan cheese.
RISOTTO DEL GIORNO
A rotating selection of risotto, each crafted with seasonal ingredients. Ask your server for today’s special.
Pesci
&
Carni
BRANZINO DEL MEDITERRANEO
Grilled Mediterranean Branzino, delicately prepared with salmoriglio sauce, served with vegetables parisienne, and tender broccolini.
ZUPPA DI PESCE “POSILLIPO”
Combination of shellfish and seafood cooked in fish broth with cherry tomato, Gaeta olives, basil, extra virgin olive oil served with crostini.
SALMONE
Norwegian Salmon fillet served with Saffron lemon Velouté
and paired sauteed spinach.
SCAMPI REALI IN PANURA PROFUMATA ALLE ERBE
Succulent Langoustines, lightly coated with fragant herb breadcrumbs and baked until golden and served with lemon aioli.
BRASATO DI MANZO AL CHIANTI
Slow-braised short ribs, cooked in a rich red wine reduction, served with garlic mashed potatoes, roasted carrots and pearl onions.
POLLO ALLA PARMIGIANA
10oz Airline organic chicken, topped with a savory tomato Sauce, mozzarella and parmesan cheese, served with asparagus gratin.
COTOLETTA ALLA MILANESE DELLO CHEF
14oz veal chop Milanese, breaded with grissini crumbs served with arugula and tomato salad.
FILETTO DI MANZO AI FUNGHI
Tender Beef tenderloin, pan-seared and served with a mix of wild mushrooms in a rich demi-glace sauce.
Accompanied by roasted potatoes.
RIB EYE
14oz grilled Bone-in Ribeye steak, served with roasted potatoes and rosemary salsa Verde.

Coming soon
Catering
MORE INFO
ABOUT US
Novecento in Key Biscayne
Novecento is a luxurious restaurant, located in the heart of one of the trendiest gastronomic areas of Key Biscayne, Miami. The restaurant group has more than 25 years of experience and landmark locations in Miami, México DF, Buenos Aires and Córdoba (Argentina) and Punta del Este (Uruguay).
Chosen by thousands of celebrities and tourists from all over the world, Novecento is a must on the trip of any sybarite who enjoys a unique culinary experience: distinguished dishes with an Argentine print, seasonal and excellent quality products, and a team that gives life to this meeting place.
Here you will find a fascinating combination of glamour and the warm welcome of the caribbean sun, with the joy and generosity that in Argentina people receive their guests at home. In a few words, the perfect combination to enjoy a very Novecento moment.
CATERING
FROM OUR CUISINE
To your party.
Whether celebrating a corporate function, a family milestone, a holiday gathering, rehearsal dinner or graduation, our team will work with you before, during and after, to ensure that every detail is done and that your event is unforgettable.
Restaurant Events
We offer an excellent Novecento-style experience, with a 3-course menu of your choice, an exclusive wine proposal and table service.
If your idea is to celebrate in a more cool and relaxed atmosphere, 900 is the perfect place to dance while having a drink at the bar and grab a bite.
MORE INFO
Outside Catering
If you were thinking about organizing something at home or in a hall, you can’t miss our CATERING proposals: our premium barbecue, with our Argentinean imprint, is all you need to become the best host. High quality meat and cuts, ready to be served at your table.
We also have the best brunch service: if you don’t consider yourself a brunch fan, it’s because you haven’t tried our delicious homemade croissants with ham and cheese, accompanied by succulent sandwiches, cheese tables and, of course, mimosas.
MORE INFO

There's nothing more decadent than fresh Florida seafood, and when visitors and locals in Hollywood and Miami, Florida, want the best, they head to Billy's Stone Crab. As one of the
top waterfront restaurants in Hollywood, FL
, Billy's Stone Crab has been serving up the best stone crab, lobster, and other seafood items for years. From succulent stone crab to types of seafood pasta, we have something to suit every taste. Pull up a chair and dive into our dinner menu to discover a few of our fan-favorite entrees.
Dinner Time Delights
The first thing you'll notice when you step inside Billy's Stone Crab is the elegant decor in the spacious dining room. Our seafood restaurant features floor-to-ceiling windows and stunning views of the waterfront. While the decor and ambiance are of an upscale restaurant, our food is sourced locally from Florida fishermen who harvest their catch fresh every day.
Our dinner menu features everything from specialty entrees like honey ginger salmon to fabulous steaks and pasta dishes. Our seafood is the star of the show, with crab harvested at the peak of stone crab season and wild shrimp caught in the Florida Keys. We have shareable sides such as grilled tomatoes, lobster mac, sweet potato fries, and garlic creamed spinach.
Stone Crab: A Must-Try Delight
Stone crab is the cream of the crop of Florida shellfish and one of the most in-demand types of seafood. What does stone crab taste like? Stone crab has a very mild flavor and a delicate texture that requires it to be eaten very quickly after it's harvested. It is slightly sweet and devoid of any strong "fishy" flavor. Stone crab is a must-try, especially if you're new to Florida or visiting the area for the first time.
At Billy's Stone Crab, we sustainably harvest stone crab from trained fishermen and serve it to our guests with the utmost care and precision. Dip the meat into our accompanying mustard sauce and discover why this delicacy is one of our top picks.
Pasta Perfection
Nothing soothes the soul and nourishes your spirit after a long day on the water like pasta. We have specialties like chicken piccata and chicken alfredo and seafood pasta such as shrimp scampi. At Billy's Stone Crab restaurant, you can customize your perfect seafood pasta dish. Select either alfredo or marinara sauce on your fettuccini noodles and then tuck into a dish full of the finest seafood, including scallops, lobster, mahi, and jumbo shrimp.
Steak Lovers
We proudly feature premium steaks and chops at Billy's Stone Crab. Our NY strip steak is 18 ounces, while our filet mignon is 12 ounces of extra-tender, flavorful beef. For the heartiest appetites, we have a 24-ounce bone-in ribeye cooked to your exacting specifications. You can also opt for a rack of lamb, grilled to perfection and served with romesco and chimichurri to bring out the natural flavors of the meat.
Sides and Add-Ons: Make it a Feast
No dinner is complete without sides, and at Billy's Stone Crab, we have side options and add-ons to suit everyone's palate. Our sides are all big enough to share, with options such as brussels sprouts, hashbrowns, grilled tomatoes, sweet potato fries, cole slaw, asparagus hollandaise, and lobster mac and cheese. Order up three or four different sides and try a little bit of everything! We don't play favorites, but we do have a soft spot for our grilled tomatoes, the ideal accompaniment for meat, chicken, or seafood.
Your Perfect Dinner Awaits
Whether you're in Florida for a few days or a lifetime, Billy's Stone Crab is the perfect choice for a fantastic dining experience you won't soon forget. Discover our dinner menu today and contact us to learn more about our delicious meal options.

Handmade.
Every. Single. Day.
Not much beats fresh pasta.
We make ours with high quality, durum wheat semolina and water,  into different shapes including Spaghetti, Linguine, Tagliatelle, Campanelle, Penne and Fusilli. We also make a Spelt Pasta (which if you haven’t tried yet, we recommend you do)
Because everything is cooked to order, from scratch in our open kitchen,  you can personalise your dish exactly as you want it.
Extra chilli? Sure. No Garlic? No problem.  Extra Prawns? Done.
Our pizza dough is handmade, and so are our sauces, salad dressings and dolci -all made in house, by us, every day.

About the Business
Dine-in or order delivery! Mamma Mia is a family owned New York Style pizzeria and full-service Italian restaurant. Our ambience is casual and family friendly with generous portions. Located in downtown Homestead, we have built a loyal clientele which returns for our friendly service and our passion for quality that is reflected in our food. Our desserts are always fresh and can be accompanied by our tempting cappuccinos or espresso coffees, always made to order!

CATERING
CHEF LOUIE BOSSI
Louie Bossi is not your typical chef. Growing up in an Italian household in New York he remembers the aromas of roasted garlic and fresh meatballs sizzling from
his family’s kitchen.
Raised by a single mother juggling three jobs, Bossi taught himself to cook at the age of eight. Working his way from dishwasher to cook at the local pizzeria Bossi developed a love for the art of pizza making.
Relocating to Florida in 2000, Bossi landed his first job with Big Time Restaurant Group as grill cook. Exploring different positions within their popular portfolio of restaurants Chef Bossi proved to be one of the hardest working and most inspired chefs in the company, which earned him the coveted Executive Chef position at Big City Tavern. Bossi's D.I.Y. approach has led him to obtain a certification from Chef Brian Polcyn in the ancient art and technique of charcuterie, as well as becoming a Master Pizza Maker from The Scuola Italiana Pizzaoili in San Francisco.
Lisabet Summa joined Big Time Restaurant Group in 1997 as the restaurant group executive chef and partner. Since then she has opened over a dozen restaurants.
Growing up in Lake Forest, Illinois her inspiration for pursuing a career in the culinary arts began. Summa largely views herself as a cook, an armchair traveler,
and an artisan.
She began working at a 5 star mobile-rated restaurant called St. Honore and also studied pastry and chocolate making in Montreal at the renowned Patisserie De Gascoigne. Later Summa become the Chef at Café L’Europe, one of the most highly acclaimed restaurants in Palm Beach, and Pastry Chef at La Vielle Maison in Boca.
The cooking knowledge that Summa employs on a daily basis comes from her experience in various positions in the kitchen. Summa spends a lot of time simplifying what she intends for a menu, and getting back to the elements that truly make a dish a success. Summa’s motto is flavor, seasoning, product quality and technique.
CHEF LISABET SUMMA

Swedish food & beverages
Say "hej" and "mmm" to our delightful range of food and beverages, merging taste seamlessly with quality. Our selection caters to every palate and occasion, so let's dive into the IKEA world of flavors!
How can I add variety to my meals effortlessly?
Spice up your routine with our diverse range of culinary delights. Experience ready-to-cook meals that taste great and save you time - and enjoy condiments that elevate your cooking experience without the hassle.
Beverage bliss
Elevate your beverage game with our selection catering to every season. Whether it's the perfect cup of
coffee
to kickstart your day or a refreshing soft drink, we offer a range that tantalises taste buds.
How can I ensure the longevity of my food products?
Keep your culinary treasures fresh and fabulous with our storage tips. Invest in airtight
containers
for any leftovers. Store perishables in the right conditions, ensuring that your ingredients stay as vibrant as the day you brought them home. Say goodbye to food waste and hello to culinary perfection.

About the Business
Experience the warmth and hospitality of Italy at Rosaluna, where traditional Italian cuisine meets modern flavors. Our menu features timeless classics with a twist, crafted from the finest ingredients. Whether you're meeting colleagues, entertaining clients, or simply enjoying a meal with us, our attentive staff will ensure a memorable experience. Join us for breakfast, lunch, dinner, or happy hour. We can't wait to welcome you!

----REGULAR FOOD MENU----
Private Celebrations Menu
* Consumer advisory: Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness, especially if you have certain medical conditions.
APPETIZERS & SHAREABLES
Trio Empanadas Colombianas
$15.00
Golden and crispy, filled with beef, chicken, or cheese. One of the best Latin street bites in Miami Beach.
Venezuelan Tequeños
$16.00/6 pieces
Crisp pastry wrapped around gooey white cheese, dangerously addictive.Irresistible cheese fingers, Venezuela’s favorite party bite.
3 Arepitas De Maiz Blanco con...
$16.00
Mini corn arepas piled high with your choice of slow-cooked meats (Beef, chicken, chorizo or juicy shrimp or seafood Add melted cheese for that ooey-gooey finish. irresistible touch. A hit at any Latin bar in Miami.
Patacones Bolivar (Signature)
$16.00
Crunchy smashed green plantains loaded with the protein of your choice (beef, chicken, chorizo, seafood mix or shrimps ) — then taken over the top with melted cheese $5. A bold Latin bite that hits every craving. A fan favorite among those looking for Latin tapas in South Beach. Perfect for sharing during happy hour in Miami Beach.
Papas De La Calle
$16.00
Dirty fries, Latin style. Crispy seasoned fries tossed with your choice of meats (beef, chicken, chorizo, seafood mix or shrimps ), crowned with queso paisa. It's wild. It’s delicious. It’s addictive. A South Beach favorite for pre-dance bites.
3 Tacos Mexi - Colombianos
$15.00
Choose Corn  or Flour tortillas filled with your choice of Pulled Beef, Pulled Chicken, Shrimps, Seafood, Chorizo, crumble queso paisa, salsa verde cilantro. Great for foodies exploring Miami’s Latin culinary scene.
Mejillones 'Criollos'
$16.00
Sautéed mussels in an aromatic citrus garlic broth of tomato and onion slightly spicy "Sofrito" and cassava.
Caleñitas (Signature)
$16.00
Golden-fried breaded pork loin bites paired with buttery potatoes. It’s hearty, crispy, and full of flavor — straight from Cali to your plate.
"Cerdo" (New)
$16.00
Mouthwatering pork ribs slow-cooked until tender and glazed in a smoky, sticky, house-made BBQ sauce. Lick-your-fingers good. The perfect bite for cocktail lovers.
Bolívar Wings (6 pcs)
$16.00/6 Pieces
Crispy, juicy wings glazed in smoky BBQ or fiery hot sauce. Bold Latin flavor in every bite.
Ceviche de chicharron "apasionado"
$16.00
Crispy pork belly soaked in a citrus-passion fruit salsa with onions and cilantro. Served with crunchy arepitas. Tangy, smoky, and insanely good.
Fried White Latino Cheese
$16.00
Golden, melty cheese bites served with your choice of crispy green plantains or sweet ripe plantains
Crispy Calamari
$16.00
Golden, crunchy calamari rings served with zesty dipping sauce — light, crispy, and addictive.
'PICADERA'  - PLATTER TO SHARE (Best Seller)
$20.00/2 Items
$56.00/6 Items
Choose:  2 Items  x  $20    or   6 Items -x $56. ITEMS TO CHOOSE: 1. 2 Colombian Patties -  2. 4 Venezuelan Cheese Sticks  -  3. Grilled Steak Strips -  4. Grilled Chicken Strips - 5. Sauteed Garlic Shrimps  -  6. Sauteed Creole Mussels -  7. 3 Corn Cakes & Hogao  -  8. Breaded Calamari -  9. Colombian Sausage -  10.  Pulled Beef 'Hogao' -  11. Pulled Chicken 'Hogao' - 12.  4 Chicken Wings - 13. Crispy Pork Belly - 14. Fried White Cheese - 15. Crispy Green Plantains - 16. Sweet Plantains - 17. Cassava Fries - 18. Yellow Potatoes  - 19. Red Beans - 20. coconut rice  - 21 seasoned fries
*CEVICHES (Cold Plates)
* Consumer advisory: Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness, especially if you have certain medical conditions.
Ceviche de Camarones Colombiano
$19.00
Boiled shrimps tosed in our traditional home made  onions-cilantro-pink sauce • salty crackers.
*Peruvian Ceviche "ECHE CEVICHE" - FISH
$19.00
Diced fresh fish tossed in a citrus passion fruit sauce cancha corn nuts • green plantain chips
* Peruvian Ceviche "BOLIVAR" - SHRIMPS
$19.00
Shrimps marinated in an exotic citrus Andean berry sauce cancha corn nuts • cassava chips
*Peruvian Ceviche “PARCE...VICHE - SEAFOOD MIX
$19.00
Seafood mix tossed in a citrus mango Sauce cancha corn nuts  • ripe plantain chips
* 6 Ceviche 'Shots' (Signature)
$19.00
Three classic Peruvian ceviche samples and three Bolivar’s signature sauces ceviche samples. Vibrant and refreshing — a sampler of six Latin ceviches that locals and tourists love. Ideal for seafood lovers searching for the best ceviche in Miami Beach restaurants and bars.
MAIN DISHES
MAIN DISHES + SIGNATURE COCKTAIL PAIRINGS
  BANDEJA PAISA (Colombia) (Signature)
$32.00
A Colombian powerhouse platter stacked with your choice of steak, grilled chicken, or tender pulled beef or chicken — plus crispy pork belly, fried egg, rice, beans, sweet plantains & arepa. Add chorizo +$7 for the full ride. Perfect Cocktail Pairing: “GRISELDA” – Coconut rum, strawberry-passion & lime. A breezy tropical escape in every sip.
PABELLÓN SIFRINO (Venezuela)
$29.00
Tender pulled beef or chicken stewed in sofrito, served with rice, red beans, and sweet plantains. Pure comfort food in the heart of South Beach. Perfect Cocktail Pairing: “GOMELO” – Bourbon, lime, brown sugar & soda. Strong, smooth, and sweet – a bold match for this iconic dish.
LOMO SALTADO (Peru)
$29.00
A fiery Peruvian stir-fry that bursts with flavor — tender beef wok-tossed with golden fries, red onions, and fresh tomatoes in a rich soy-spiced sauce. Served with a fluffy tower of white rice to soak up every bold bite.. Perfect Cocktail Pairing: “PISCO PASIÓN” – Pisco, lime, ginger ale & passion fruit. Tropical and zesty – a coastal companion.
PASTA “SABROSA” (Colombia)
$19.00/Plain
$29.00/with Protein
Creamy Colombian-style linguini pasta made with Alfredo and guasca herbs. Add protein: Grilled Steak Strips +$10 | Grilled Chicken +$10 | Grilled Fish +$10 | Grilled Shrimps +$10 | Grilled Seafood mix +$10 | Colombian Sausage "Chorizo" +$10.  Perfect Cocktail Pairing: “BOLIVARTINI” – Vodka with passion fruit, mango, or blackberry. Smooth and juicy with a tropical twist. The best Latin twist on pasta in South Florida.
POLLO ANDINO (Bolivia)
$29.00
Grilled chicken topped with a savory mushroom-quinoa sauce and served with seasoned fries.  A balanced dish for guests craving something flavorful and unique.. Perfect Cocktail Pairing: “LIBERTADOR” – Aguardiente with passion-strawberry-blue. Complex, herbaceous, and bold.
“VACÍO” STEAK (Argentina)
$35.00
Argentine-style flap steak pure parrilla flavor with chimichurri, crispy fries & balsamic greens. Classic Latin beef, done the Miami way. . Perfect Cocktail Pairing: “BICHOTA” – Rum, peach schnapps & blackberry syrup. Bold, rich & fruity – made for steak.
CAZUELA PACIFICO (Colombia)
$29.00
Creamy coconut seafood stew with shrimp & fish, served with white rice & crispy patacón. A coastal Colombian fantasy on your plate.Perfect Cocktail Pairing: “PISCO PASIÓN” – Pisco, lime, ginger ale & passion fruit. Tropical and zesty – a coastal companion.
PESCADO MARGARITA (Venezuela)
$29.00
Grilled fish with seafood topping, three aji sauces, quinoa & potatoes. A colorful, slightly spicy plate. Perfect Cocktail Pairing: “BICHESITO” – Tequila or gin, mango biche, tajín & cane syrup. A little heat and citrus to lift the flavor.
CAMARONES  'AJILLO CRIOLLO' (Ecuador)
$29.00
Shrimps simmered in a savory garlic hogao broth, with rice & crispy patacón. Perfect Cocktail Pairing: “AGUA DE FLORERO” – A wild mix of five spirits with mint, lime & strawberry. Tropical and energetic.
MARISCOS  'AJILLO CRIOLLO' (Ecuador)
$29.00
Seafood simmered in a savory garlic hogao broth, with rice & crispy patacón. Perfect Cocktail Pairing: “BOLIVARTINI” – Vodka with passion fruit, mango, or blackberry. Smooth and juicy with a tropical twist.
“MOJARRA” FISH (Colombia)
$35.00
Crispy, golden whole mojarra — one of the best seafood dishes in Miami Beach. Served with traditional Colombian coconut rice and crispy patacón. A must-try for lovers of Latin flavors, beachside vibes, and authentic Colombian food in South Beach. Perfect Cocktail Pairing: “GRISELDA” – Coconut rum with strawberry-passion – Caribbean sweetness that brings the dish alive.
HAMBURGUESA DE BOLIVAR
$18.00
Grilled ground angus beef or grilled tender chicken breast, melted white cheese, hint of pinapple sauce, tomato, onions, served with seasoned fries. Add: Egg $4. Perfect Cocktail Pairing: “SEXAPILOSO” – Watermelon & lime with tequila or vodka – bright, juicy, and perfect with a burger.
SOUPS
SOPA DE POLLO Y VEGETALES
$15.00
A warm, comforting classic with tender chicken, perfect for a relaxing meal after a beach day. A taste of Latin home cooking in the heart of Miami.
CREMA DE CAMARONES (Colombia)
$17.00
A creamy blend of shrimp and corn that’s smooth, rich, and comforting. A Miami favorite when craving something warm and indulgent.
SANCOCHO DE COSTILLA DE RES (Colombia)
$29.00
Slow-cooked bone-in short ribs in a traditional Colombian broth, served with white rice.
SIDES
White Rice
$8.00
Red Beans
$8.00
Seasoned French Fries
$8.00
Hogao Sofrito
$8.00
Onions - tomatoes - scallions sofrito puree
SALAD
Add protein: Colombian Sausage "Chorizo" +$7.00 | Grilled Steak Strips +$11.00 | Grilled Chicken +$11.00 | Grilled Shrimps +$11.00
ANDINA VERDE
$15.00
Mixed greens • shredded white cheese • green apple • cherry tomatoes  • croutons • balsamic vinaigrette dressing. Add protein:  Grilled Steak Strips +$10 | Grilled Chicken +$10 | Grilled Fish +$10 | Grilled Shrimps +$10 | Grilled Seafood mix +$10 | Colombian Sausage "Chorizo" +$7
BRUNCH (All Day)
CALENTAO MEDELLIN (Signature)
$10.00/extra protein
$16.99/eggs
Classic breakfast from Medellin, Colombia. Two eggs any style served with a hearty medly of red beans, with rice, white arepa topped with monterrey cheese. Add steak, chicken $10 or colombian sausage. $7
'SOUTH BEACH SUNRISE' (Miami)
$5.00/avocado
$7.00/extra chorizo
$16.99/eggs
2 eggs any style served with our house-specialty sautéed creole fried potatoes mixed with "Hogao" (tomatoes-onions sofrito). and mix green salad • Add Avocado +$5.00 | Colombian Sausage +$7.00
DESSERTS
We serve iconic homemade Latin sweets that locals and tourists crave. If you’re searching for traditional Latin desserts, authentic Colombian treats, or just a sweet ending to your dinner in South Beach, this is the spot.
CARIBEÑO
$12.00
Traditonal tres leches cake. Slather a rich layer of golden caramel
PALENQUERO
$12.00
Moist and rich chocolate cake layered with dulce de leche covered with chocolate fudge
CHAMO
$10.00
Key Lime pie. Tangy, sweet flavor and creamy texture
ÑAÑITO
$12.00
Rich custard Creme Brulee topped with a layer of hard caramel.
--------

MENU
In Casa Mia Trattoria, we strive to create great Italian dishes for you and your family to enjoy in our casual trattoria, where you are considered part of our family. We specialize in providing a personalized experience that brings together homemade dishes and great wines. Here you will be able to access our three different menus of the variety of appetizers and entrées we offer for lunch and dinner, as well as our selection of wines:

Caffe di Notte
Skip to content
9793 SW 72nd St, Miami, FL 33173
(305) 412-3310
Home
About Us
Menus
Wine List
Contact Us
CAFFE DI NOTTE
About Caffe di Notte
Since our beginning in June 2003, our vision has been to bring a creative style of cuisine to our city. Mixing a style of Italian cuisine with tropical flavors, we have created a style that we like to call “fusion”. Our promise and commitment to our customers is that we will always work hard to be creative in our dishes and provide them with the best possible service.
Thank you very much for allowing us to serve you for these 19 years and we hope to do so for many more years.

Main Menu
Located on the best block in South Beach, Mercato della Pescheria is a taste of the history of a coastal Italian seafood market with fresh seafood delivered daily and an entire menu of selections made with natural and fresh ingredients.
From individual to group dining, in the heart of Espanola Way, resulting in a traditional, simply delicious and authentic Italian restaurant cuisine experience with a variety of homemade pasta, wood oven pizza, exquisite fresh fish, savory steaks, Italian wines and cocktails.

About the Business
Business owner information
Rubens  P.
Business Owner
As an Italian restaurant located in West Miami, we take pride in our specialty of wood-fired pizza and authentic Italian cuisine. Our pizzas are cooked to perfection in a wood-fired oven, creating the perfect crispy crust and delicious toppings. Our menu also includes a range of classic Italian dishes, from pasta and salads to meat and seafood entrees. We strive to create a warm and welcoming atmosphere for all of our guests, whether you're joining us for a casual lunch or a special occasion. Come visit us and experience the taste of authentic Italian cuisine in West Kendall

name: Graziano's in Bird Rd
raw_text:
Restaurant – Bird Road – Graziano's
Order Now
Order Now
Bird Road
9227 SW 40th Street
Miami, FL, 33165
(305) 225-0008
Our Bird Road restaurant was our first restaurant in Miami. We established our market on Bird Road and then, when the cafeteria behind the market closed, we took that as a sign to take over the space and open a restaurant. The Bird Road restaurant includes a fire pit and is a great place for a family meal. Open for lunch and dinner.

77bet
là cái tên được nhiều thành viên tìm kiếm nhất trên nền tảng trực tuyến. Với nhiều
ưu điểm vượt trội

chinh phục trò chơi yêu thích
và tận dụng cơ hội kiếm tiền hấp dẫn.
Giới thiệu 77bet tổng quan
77bet là thương hiệu cá cược nổi bật về chất lượng trò chơi và dịch vụ giải trí. Với
nhiều năm kinh nghiệm
trên thị trường trực tuyến, nơi đây đã nâng cấp

, hệ thống bảo mật cao. Hiện tại, nhà cái đã sở hữu giấy phép hoạt động hợp pháp do
tổ chức PAGCOR
cấp. Điều này chứng tỏ sự uy tín hàng đầu của trang đổi thưởng.
Truy cập vào trang chủ, các bạn đắm chìm vào thế giới game đa màu sắc. Nơi đây quy tụ
đầy đủ những thể loại giải trí
từ truyền thống đến mới lạ, mang đến những giây phút thư giãn lý tưởng. Không chỉ tham gia giải trí mà thành viên có cơ hội
đặt cược kiếm tiền hấp dẫn
về túi.
Đặc biệt, thương hiệu giải trí luôn
chào đón và bảo vệ quyền lợi của bet thủ
. Các bạn sẽ được hướng dẫn chi tiết các thao tác đăng ký, 77bet đăng nhập, nạp rút hay chơi game online. Đồng thời, anh em có bất kỳ thắc mắc hay cần sự hỗ trợ thì
liên hệ ngay với bộ phận CSKH
sẽ được giải quyết ngay lập tức.
Điểm danh các game ăn khách nhất 2025
Nhà cái sở hữu
kho game phong phú
, nhiều chủ đề giải trí độc đáo. Đây cũng chính là một trong những điểm
thu hút hàng nghìn thành viên tin tưởng chọn
truy cập vào 77bet. Dưới đây là một số game ưa chuộng mà anh em không nên bỏ qua.
Game slots đỉnh cao
Game slots mang đến nhiều chủ đề quay hũ thú vị, đáp ứng nhu cầu người chơi. Cụ thể như
Nổ Hũ, Fruits Jackpot, Pirates Treasure, Gold Rush…
Tất cả những tựa game quay hũ này đều được phát triển bởi các nhà cung cấp lớn gồm
Playtech, Microgaming và Pragmatic
. Vì vậy, các bạn tự tin khám phá, thử vận may của mình.
Không dừng lại đó,
tỷ lệ RTP slot game
tại trang chủ hay 77bet app đều đưa ra khá cao. Điều này đồng nghĩa với việc cơ hội nhận thưởng khi chiến thắng một lượt quay slot có thể
lên đến hàng trăm triệu đồng, thậm chí tỷ đồng
. Từ đó, anh em có thể rút ngắn thời gian làm giàu cho chính mình.
Casino thú vị
Một trong những game yêu thích của cộng đồng bet thủ là casino live. Nổi bật với
đồ họa 3D sắc nét
, tạo cảm giác chân thực như đang bước chân vào các sòng bạc ngoài đời thực. Đặc biệt, nhà cái đã
hợp tác với nhiều nhà phát hành game
casino hàng đầu và cho ra mắt các sảnh game chất lượng như
WM, Sexy, AG hay EVO…
Bước chân và 77bet casino, hội viên được tham gia đấu trí ở nhiều trò chơi khác nhau. Trong đó gồm
Baccarat, Blackjack, Sicbo, Rồng Hổ, Roulette và Poker.
Đặc biệt, các bạn không chỉ thách đấu với các thành viên trong bàn cược mà còn
đối đầu trực tiếp với nhà cái.
Những Dealer quyến rũ sẽ tham gia vào những ván live trực tiếp với vai trò điều hành cuộc chơi.
Bắn cá thưởng lớn
Bắn cá đổi thưởng là lựa chọn tuyệt vời khi hội viên muốn khám phá thế giới dưới đại dương rộng lớn.
Đa dạng sinh vật
được khắc họa tĩnh động, mang đến cảm giác hào hứng cho thành viên. Tựa game được phát triển từ trò chơi bắn cá truyền thống với nhiều chủ đề như
săn cá ăn xèng, thần tài, Fishing Diary hay Fishing Jackpot…
Không chỉ đắm chìm vào không gian sôi động dưới biển mà hội viên còn có cơ hội tiêu diệt cá nhận tiền khủng. Theo đó, anh em
hóa thân thành ngư thủ
, sử dụng những vũ khí mà hệ thống cung cấp gồm súng, đạn để bắt đầu hành trình săn lùng sinh vật biển. Các bạn hạ
gục càng nhiều chú cá tích lũy số xu lớn
, có cơ hội đổi thưởng lấy tiền mặt cực sung.
Bingo may mắn
Game Bingo không quá xa lạ đối với cộng đồng bet thủ Việt. Với những
đường thẳng, đường chéo may mắn
mang đến chiến thắng không hề nhỏ cho người chơi. Truy cập vào 77 bet, anh em được thử sức ở nhiều thể loại gồm
Free Bingo Games, Abradoodle, Bash, Blaze, IGG hay Gem Rush…
Tuy nhiên, để chiến thắng trong những lượt chơi Bingo này, bet thủ cần linh hoạt khi chọn số.
Với nhiều phòng chơi khác nhau, anh em lựa chọn theo sở thích của mình. Mục tiêu là
xác định 5 con số xuất hiện thành hàng dọc, ngang hoặc chéo
trên tấm bảng Bingo lớn sẽ chiến thắng. Lưu ý, các bạn phải đối chiếu con số trên các quả bóng mục tiêu chuẩn xác với các hàng B, I, N, G, O.
Bên cạnh những game nổi bật trên, thành viên còn có cơ hội khám phá ở nhiều thể loại khác. Chẳng hạn như
xổ số, thể thao, game bài…
với tỷ lệ trả thưởng cao nhất nhì trên thị trường cá cược. Hội viên còn chần chờ gì, nhanh chóng tham gia trải nghiệm ngay.
Trải nghiệm tiện ích trên app 77bet vip
Không chỉ truy cập vào trang chủ theo đường link chính thức, người chơi có thể sử dụng dịch vụ nhà cái ngay trên ứng dụng. App thương hiệu cá cược được thiết lập
thích hợp với mọi hệ điều hành gồm Android, iOS và PC
. Cụ thể, giới thiệu 77bet app với những ưu điểm nổi bật sau đây.
Dung lượng nhỏ, nói không với virus
Ứng dụng trang đổi thưởng được thiết kế với
dung lượng không quá cao
. Do đó, các bạn chỉ cần chuẩn bị điện thoại hoặc máy tính còn dung lượng trống vừa đủ có thể tải ngay. Hơn nữa, app thương hiệu cá cược đã được
loại bỏ virus gây nguy hại cho thiết bị di động
. Chính vì vậy, anh em yên tâm download xuống và trải nghiệm trò chơi yêu thích.
Tích hợp nhiều tính năng
Mọi thao tác hay tính năng tại ứng dụng đều được
tích hợp như trên website
. Điều này giúp các bạn thuận tiện sử dụng và tham gia đặt cược kiếm tiền hấp dẫn. Trong đó nổi bật với những
tính năng tiện ích
trong quá trình truy cập vào trang chủ.
Đăng nhập tự động
: Tính năng này khá mới mẻ, chưa có nhà cái nào thực hiện ngoài 77 bet. Theo đó, anh em cần cập nhật sinh trắc học, sau đó quét mã để đăng nhập.
Thông báo bảng kèo cược
: Trang chủ sẽ cung cấp thông tin chi tiết về bảng tỷ lệ kèo của nhà cái để anh em soi cầu.
Thống kê kết quả tại 77bet casino
: Hệ thống sẽ tổng hợp kết quả thắng và thua của tất cả người chơi trong ván cược, bạn sẽ biết được ai là người chiến thắng.
Cập nhật khuyến mãi mới
: Thành viên đăng ký số điện thoại hoặc địa chỉ email chính chủ sẽ nhận được thông báo khi thương hiệu tung ưu đãi mới.
Quy trình tải chỉ với vài bước
Quá trình tải ứng dụng nhà cái
không quá phức tạp
nhưng thành viên cần thận trọng. Cụ thể, để an toàn thì các bạn chỉ cần thực hiện theo hướng dẫn như sau:
Bước 1
: Truy cập vào trang chủ 77bet, lấy đường link chính thức và không bị chặn.
Bước 2
: Tại giao diện chính, bạn nhấn vào “
App
”. Lúc này, hệ thống sẽ chuyển đến một trang mới chứa link và mã QR cho ba hệ điều hành Android, iOS và PC. Tùy vào dòng thiết bị bạn sở hữu để lựa chọn cách tải ứng dụng tương ứng.
Bước 3
: Sau khi download app nhà cái thành công, anh em vào mục “
Cài đặt
” của thiết bị di động. Sau đó di chuyển đến mục quản lý ứng dụng và chọn app vừa tải. Đối với điện thoại Android chọn “
Cho phép nguồn không rõ
” còn thiết bị iOS chọn “
Tin cậy
” là hoàn tất.
Khuyến mãi siêu hời chỉ có tại trang chủ cá cược
Đăng ký tại trang chủ 77bet, thành viên sẽ nhận được nhiều chương trình ưu đãi hấp dẫn. Mỗi sự kiện tặng thưởng sẽ có
một vài điều khoản và giá trị khác nhau
nhưng không khó để anh em săn thưởng. Dưới đây là ba chương trình khuyến mãi vô thời hạn chỉ có tại nhà cái.
Tặng thưởng chào mừng
Thương hiệu cá cược luôn dành các phần quà đặc biệt cho những người chơi mới truy cập. Đây được xem như là một lời chào mừng chân thành của nhà cái, mang đến chút
quà nhỏ cho tân bin
h. Cụ thể, khi đăng ký tài khoản thành viên hợp lệ, anh em

vào account cá cược. Thêm vào đó, các bạn còn

, với giá trị thưởng lên đến 3.388K.
Tri ân thành viên trung thành
Khuyến mãi 77bet được tung ra mỗi ngày với
số lượng nhận thưởng không giới hạn
. Không ít thành viên đã săn thành công những ưu đãi siêu hời từ trang chủ. Hiện nay, nhà cái đang có hàng loạt sự kiện tặng thưởng áp dụng cho tất cả thành viên.

Romina Guerra
Delicioso y buena atención. Ir con tiempo para saborear mejor todos los platos!
carlos caruso
Fuimos a almorzar la comida es grandiosa y me encanto poder pedir la comida desde un iPad en la mesa, súper rápido y súper recomendable el lugar.
Seguramente volveremos pronto.
Elisa Londono
Amazing food.
Nice vibe.
Naivys Hernández Espinosa
Me encanta
Nelly Pimentel
Tacology is a must every time we visit Miami. Fun ambience, drinks and nice staff. We recommend getting the flan for dessert. Special thanks to Pablo for his great service!
Tacology is a “mercado style dining.” Where people can choose from our various stations (Tacos, Ceviches y Tostadas , Desserts, Salads and juices) where we offer authentic and artistic Mexican Tacos from home-made corn tortillas, colorful Ceviches and delicious Salads.

Our Menus
BREAKFAST MENU
HUEVOS RANCHERO
Guajillo red sauce, tortillas, two fried eggs, chorizo, pico de gallo, cotija cheese, fresh cheese.
BREAKFAST BURRITO
Flour
tortilla, chihuahua cheese, vegetable mix, scrambled egg, chorizo, refried beans and Mexican cream. Served with potatoes and
melted cheese.
BREAKFAST TACOS
Three corn tortillas tacos, scrambled eggs, pico de gallo, chipotle mayo, cotija cheese and cilantro. Served with potatoes and melted cheese.
STEAK & EGGS
10 0z Steak skirt, two fried eggs.
Served with potatoes, melted cheese and red sauce
MEXICAN OMELET
Egg cake with spinach, button mushroom and chihuahua cheese. Served with potatoes and melted cheese.
HUEVOS DIVORCIADOS
Red guajillo sauce, green Tomatillo sauce, white rice,
pico de gallo, tajin and fried eggs.
AVOCADO TOAST
M
ultigrain bread, fried egg and fresh guacamole.
JUICE
Mango, Passion Fruit, Strawberry, Orange, Pineapple, Cranberry,
Lemon
ade
COFFEE
Espresso, Americano, Cappuccino, Caffe' Latte,
Cortadito
COCKTAIL
Bloody Mary, Cubanito, Mimosa, Bellini, Rossini, Prosecco
SMOOTHIE
Mango, Passion Fruit, Strawberry, Guava
LUNCH/DINNER MENU
APPETIZERS
NACHOS
Refried beans, crispy tortilla chips, cheese sauce, pico de gallo, pickled jalapeño, mexican cream and guacamole.
ELOTES
Charcoal-grilled fresh corn, cotija cheese, tajin. Served with cilantro cream.
CHILAQUILES
Corn tortillas, green sauce / red sauce, fresh cheese, cilantro, fresh jalapeno, two eggs
.
EL MERO MERO GUACAMOLE
Hass avocado, lime juice, red onion and cilantro, topped with pico de gallo.
CHICKEN FLAUTA
Crispy corn tortilla, filled with chicken and cheese, with mexican cream, pico de gallo, guacamole and lettuce on top.
*TUNA TOSTADA
Crispy corn tortilla with raw tuna, avocado slice, chipotle mayo, crispy leeks and sesame seed.
*SHRIMP CEVICHE
Shrimp marinated in leche de tigre, pico de gallo and red onion.
CRISPY CALAMARI
Fresh calamari in seasoned flour, chipotle sauce and tajin on top.
*AGUACHILES
Shrimp, cucumber, lemon juice, serrano chili, red onion, cilantro leaves.
TACOS
All tacos served with white rice and beans.
LA ROSA DE GUADALUPE
Flour tortilla, dice steak, Chihuahua cheese and avocado slice.
TACOS AL PASTOR
Corn tortilla, pork marinated in achiote, white onions, cilantro, grilled pineapple and guacamole cream.
CHICKEN TACOS A LA MEXICANA
Flour tortilla, chicken breast, chihuahua cheese, crispy bacon, black beans, chipotle mayo and avocado slice.
CARNE ASADA TACOS
Corn tortilla, grilled churrasco, topped with white onion and cilantro.
RIBEYE TACOS
Corn tortilla, Angus grilled ribeye steak, grated cheese, pico de
gallo, avocado slice and guacamole cream.
CARNITAS TACOS
Yucatan-style pork, slow-roasted in banana leaves for rich, traditional flavor.
Served on 100% corn blue tortillas with whole beans, pico de gallo and crispy chicharon.
FISH TACOS
Flour tortilla, crispy tempura fish, red cabbage, garlic mayo, cilantro and radish.
GRILLED MAHI-MAHI TACOS
Flour tortilla, grilled fish with red onions, pico de gallo and cilantro cream.
CHIPOTLE SHRIMP TACOS
Flour tortilla, marinated shrimp in chipotle sauce, chopped cabbage, pico de gallo and cilantro cream.
BIRRIA TACOS
Corn tortilla, shredded beef, white onion, mexican cheese,
cilantro with consommé dipping
sauce.
BURRITOS
Flour tortilla, cheese, refried beans, rice, street corn, chipotle mayo and cilantro. Served with guacamole and small salad.
-Chicken  -Shrimp
-Steak  -Mixed
QUESADILLAS
Flour tortilla, cheese, melted cheese, guacamole, mexican cream and pico de gallo on top.
-Chicken  -Shrimp
-Steak  -Mixed
ENCHILADAS
Corn tortilla, cheese, mexican cream and red onions. Choice of red or green sauce, served with rice and refried beans.
-Chicken
-Steak
FAJITAS
Sizzling skillet, roasted peppers and white onions, served with corn tortillas, rice and refried beans.
-Chicken  -Shrimp
-Steak  -Mixed
MEXICAN CHEF’S SPECIALS
RED SNAPPER
Whole crispy fish, garlic and mojo, served with a small salad, rice and beans.
SEAFOOD MOLCAJETE
A lava rock bowl filled with red sauce, octopus, calamari, scallops, mussels, clams, shrimp, mahi-mahi fish, Mexican cheese, white onions, green and red pepper, served with corn tortillas, rice and refried beans.
GRILLED SNAPPER FILLET
Red snapper fillet, white rice, guajillo sauce, capers and olives.
SHORT RIBS TACOS
Fired-roasted beef short ribs , slow-cooked for deep, rich flavor. Served with fresh cilantro, diced onion and crispy leeks on warn tortillas.
MOLCAJETE
A lava rock bowl filled with red or green sauce, steak, chicken, shrimp, chorizo, mexican cheese, white onion, green and red pepper, served with corn tortilla, rice and refried beans.
CHURRASCO SKIRT STEAK
Skirt Steak, choice of French fries or baby salad. Served with rice and beans.
SALADS
CAESAR SALAD
Crispy hearts of romaine lettuce tossed with caesar dressing, topped with croutons and cotija cheese.
ABUELA’S SALAD
Mix green, avocado, tomato, corn,
red onion and crispy leeks on top.
VEGGIE
VEGGIE TACOS
Corn tortilla, roasted green and red peppers, white onions, mushroom, street corn and crispy brussels. Served with house salad.
VEGGIE FAJITAS
Roasted green and red peppers, white onions, zucchini, mushroom, street corn and cilantro, served with guacamole and corn tortillas.
VEGGIE BURRITO
Flour tortilla, green pepper, red pepper, onions, zucchini, mushroom, street corn, cheese and cilantro, served with salad and guacamole.
BURGER
G
UACAMOLE BURGER
Angus beef, Muenster cheese, chipotle mayo, lettuce, tomato, red onion
and g
ua
camole. Served with French fries.
KIDS
CHICKEN FINGERS
Served with French fries.
KIDS QUESADILLAS
Served with French fries.
TACOS DE POLLO
Flour tortilla.
SIDES
TORTILLAS - VEGGIES - GUACAMOLE - REFRIED BEANS - AVOCADO SLICES - FRENCH FRIES - SMALL SALAD - WHITE RICE - LOBSTER TAIL

What’s Cooking
at Toro Toro Miami?
Here, our menus go beyond tender steaks. Each day, we highlight the cuisine of a different Latin American country, and serve our takes on regional favorites for lunch and dinner. Add in a robust wine list and acclaimed desserts, and you have a restaurant fit for every appetite. Open daily for lunch and dinner along with bar service where you can enjoy our bar bites menu and all meals.
