The quintessential New York City Parisian-style brasserie, Pastis, has arrived in sunny Florida. The critically-acclaimed restaurant that anchored Manhattan’s Meatpacking District for nearly 15 years, brings its signature “je ne sais quoi” vibe to its newest location in Wynwood, one of Miami’s most creative and booming neighborhoods.  Ooh la la!

ORDER
Made by chefs, served with hustle.
THE SUMMER MENU
The future of food is here.
We're a farm-to-table
New American restaurant
serving seasonal, locally-sourced food from farms close to home. It's simple: our food is sourced from farmers and partners we know on a first-name basis, brought in from the fields, and cooked by chefs who know their vegetables.
Our healthy dining options are unique and flavorful, changing with the seasons for optimal quality and ultimate taste. Check out our
catering
menu today, or order your food for dine-in,
pick-up
or
delivery
today.
Seasonal Highlights
Chef curated pairings to showcase our favorite seasonal ingredients.
NEW!
– Golden Beet & Burrata Salad
Fresh Local Burrata, Golden Beets, Summer Tomatoes, Baby Arugula, Farm Greens with Mint, Pickled Onion, Pistachio Streusal, Basil Pesto (un)dressing.
Contains dairy, wheat, soy, & tree nuts:pistachio.
NEW!
– Summer BBQ Chicken Salad
Roasted BBQ Chicken Breast, Shaved Cabbage, Tuscan Kale, Charred Corn, Tomatoes, Cucumbers, Radishes, Cilantro, Cotija Cheese, Half Avocado, Cilantro Lime Vinaigrette.
Contains dairy & soy.
NEW!
– Skinny Protein Plate
Grass-fed Steak, Rosemary Roasted Chicken Breast, Street Cart Corn, Summer Tomatoes, Pecan Kale Caesar, Golden Quinoa, Farm Greens with Mint, Basil Pesto (un)dressing.
Contains dairy, soy & tree nuts: pecans.
NEW!
– Wild Mushroom Chimichurri Salad
Blue Oyster Mushrooms Mix, Blistered Tomato Farro Salad, Farm Greens with Mint, Summer Tomatoes, Street Cart Corn, Half Avocado, Lime Wedge, Cider Vinaigrette (un)dressing
Contains soy & dairy.
It’s back!
– Backyard BBQ Chicken Plate
Honey BBQ Chicken, Mac & Cheese, Homemade Cornbread, Cucumber Ranch Salad, Honey BBQ & Vegan Ranch (un)dressing.
Contains soy, dairy, eggs & wheat.
Surf & Turf Plate
Grass-fed Steak, Faroe Island Salmon, Green Beans with Romesco, Roasted Sweet Potatoes, Brown Rice with Parsley, Garlic Aioli (un)dressing.
Contains soy & tree nuts: almonds.
Steak & Mushroom Plate
Grass-Fed Steak, Blue Oyster Mushroom Mix, Mac & Cheese, Charred Broccoli with Lemon & Garlic, Brown Rice with Parsley, Basil Pesto (un)dressing.
Contains dairy, wheat & soy.
High Protein Plate
Rosemary Roasted Chicken Breast, Grass-Fed Steak, Charred Broccoli with Lemon & Garlic, Roasted Sweet Potatoes, Brown Rice with Parsley, Garlic Aioli (un)dressing.
Contains soy.
Classic Naked Plate
Charred Chicken, Mac & Cheese, Pecan Kale Caesar, Brown Rice with Parsley, Garlic Aioli (un)dressing.
Contains wheat, dairy, tree nuts & soy.
Local Farmer Plate
Charred Chicken, Roasted Sweet Potatoes, Charred Broccoli with Lemon & Garlic, Brown Rice with Parsley, Garlic Aioli (un)dressing.
Contains soy.
Farmer’s Snack
Choose One Harvest Side, Grain or Green, and One Main, and choice of (un)dressing.
Harvest Your Plate
Harvest Plates with a Main include one Grain or Greens, two sides, and your choice of (un)dressing. Farmer’s Basket includes a Vegetable as a Main.
Honey BBQ Chicken Plate
Charred Chicken Thigh, Lime Juice, Cilantro, Honey, Homemade BBQ Sauce.
Includes one base, two sides, and your choice of (un)dressing.
Contains soy
Grass-Fed Steak Plate
Seasonal Grass-fed Beef, Sea Salt, Pepper, Avocado Oil, Steak Rub.
Includes one base, two sides, and your choice of (un)dressing.
Rosemary Roasted Chicken Plate
Roasted Chicken Breast, Garlic, Parsley, Rosemary.
Includes one base, two sides, and your choice of (un)dressing.
Charred Chicken Plate
Charred Chicken Thigh, Florida Citrus Marinade, Garlic, EVOO, Sea Salt, Pepper.
Includes one base, two sides, and your choice of (un)dressing.
Faroe Island Salmon Plate
Grilled Salmon (served medium), Sea Salt, Pepper.
Includes one base, two sides, and your choice of (un)dressing.
Blue Oyster Mushroom Plate
Roasted Blue Oyster & Portobello Mushroom, Sea Salt, Pepper, Cilantro Chimichurri.
Includes one base, two sides, and your choice of (un)dressing.
Vegan.
Farmer’s Basket
Vegetable as a Main. Choose one Grain or Greens, three sides, and your choice of (un)dressing.
Vegan

- Street Cart Corn

Contains dairy & soy.
NEW
- Green Beans with Romesco
Green Beans, Homemade Romesco Sauce, Toasted Almonds.
Vegan. Contains tree nuts: almonds.
NEW
- Cucumber Ranch Salad
English Cucumbers, Vegan Ranch, Shaved Red Radish, Fresh Tarragon & Dill, Kosher Salt, Black Pepper.
Vegan. Contains soy.

Grape Tomatoes, Pickled Red Onions, EVOO, Fresh Herbs, Red Wine Vinegar.
Vegan.
Golden Beets & Pistachio Streusel
Golden Beets, Pistachio Streusel, Cottage Cheese, Fresh Herbs, EVOO
Contains dairy, wheat & tree nuts: pistachios.
Roasted Sweet Potatoes

Vegan. Contains wheat.
Mac & Cheese

Contains wheat & dairy
NEW
- Golden Quinoa

Vegan.
Brown Rice with Parsley

Farm Greens with Mint

Honey BBQ Chicken

About the Business
Business owner information
Jose P.
Business Owner
Gourmet pizza served 24 hours a day 7 days a week, there really couldn't be anything better than this. Venezia Pizza & Lounge is the place to go for delicious food whenever you want. While we specialize in pizza, our extensive menu also offers delicious breakfast, lunch, and dinner menu that is sure to satisfy any appetite at any time. No matter what time it is, feel free to dine in, pick up, or let us bring it you. We also would love to make your next event or party extra special with our catering services. 

Venezia Pizza & Lounge provides friendly service along with an amazing atmosphere that continuously keeps our customers coming back again and again. We also think that since we're open 24 hours doesn't hurt either. You haven't tasted real pizza until you've experienced gourmet pizza from Venezia Pizza & Lounge.
…

The OMAKAI Experience
The ultimate representation
of our concept, where you
trust the chef to take you
on a culinary journey.
Indulge in 17 pieces,
featuring the best seasonal
ingredients and specialty
cuts of seafood.
You’ll familiarize yourself
with the Japanese concept
of Omotenashi or
‘hospitality from the heart’.
95
OMA bite
20
OMA Vegan
28
Our chefs carefully sauce each dish, so we politely decline requests for additional sauces. Due to the limited quantities of fresh fish received daily, we are unable to accommodate substitutions—except for shellfish allergies. However, please note that cross-contamination is possible, and for guests with severe allergies, we strongly recommend not dining at our establishment.

Although unlikely, you may find small pieces of bone or shell in our sushi. Our Bluefiná tuna is sustainably ranched from Baja California, Mexico. Please note an 18% service charge is applied on all bills to ensure fair wages and benefits for all team members all year long. Additional gratuity is at the discretion of each guest.

HOME
Located in the heart of Florida’s Riviera, Sunny Isles Beach, Timo has become an icon of neighborhood restaurants since
opening in 2003.
With Chef Tim Andriola’s Italian-Mediterranean inspired cuisine and a timeless attentive dining room, Timo has earned a following of South Florida and national pundits equally. The restaurant’s warm inviting atmosphere is the perfect place for a quick bite, an intimate meal, or a fun meeting place to gather with family and friends. Timo offers an exquisite menu with only the highest quality and freshest ingredients available.
The menu changes seasonally and offers a contemporary Italian-Mediterranean
interpretation of traditional favorites complemented by an exceptional wine list of old world and new world selections alike. What started out as two F.I.U. Hospitality major students dream has turned into a four-star neighborhood restaurant.
We hope you enjoy!

About the Business
Business owner information
Dave A.
Business Owner
You've heard about it. You've read about it. Now it's time to try the world's greatest chili dog for yourself. Arbetter's Hot Dogs started in 1959 as a way to add some good cheer and great flavors to our neighbors' days, and we've been cooking up our family recipes ever since. Our dedication to providing customers with the best -- both in terms of service and taste -- has stayed the same throughout our more than fifty years. We can't wait to share our hot dog tradition with you and your family!

cal represents calories
With the guidance of registered dietitians, we have prepared this menu based on the most current information available from our suppliers and their stated absence of gluten within these items. Please be aware that because our dishes are prepared-to-order, during normal kitchen operations, individual foods may come into contact with one another due to shared cooking and preparation areas. Thus we cannot guarantee that cross-contact with foods containing gluten will not occur. We encourage you to carefully consider your dining choices and your individual dietary needs when dining with us. When placing your order, please let your server know that you are ordering a gluten-free menu item.
*Consuming raw or undercooked meats (such as rare/medium rare), poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness, especially if you have certain medical conditions; these items may contain raw or undercooked ingredients.
**Item contains or may contain nuts.

A CULINARY EXPERIENCE
Immerse yourself in a world of epicurean delight at our main dining room, where culinary artistry meets fine dining excellence. Our talented Chef curates an unparalleled gastronomic adventure, harmonizing flavors, textures, and innovation.
Join us for an unforgettable culinary escapade that promises to enchant every palate.

Cookie Overview
This website uses cookies so we can provide you with the best user experience possible. Cookie information is stored in your browser and performs functions such as recognising you when you return to our website and helping our team to understand which sections of the website you find most interesting and useful. You can adjust your preferences below.
Essential Cookies
Essential Cookies are enabled at all times so that we can save your preferences for cookie settings. These cookies do not collect any personal or sensitive information or IP addresses. Furthermore, the information they store is not sent to any 3rd parties.
Enable or Disable Cookies

Analytical Cookies
This website uses third party cookies such as Google Analytics to collect anonymous information, for example the number of visitors to the site, and the most popular pages. Keeping this cookie enabled helps us to improve our website.

We are El Toro Steakhouse, where culinary mastery meets unparalleled quality. Our Steakhouse Menu is crafted to tantalize your taste buds with the finest selections of USDA Prime Signature Meats, delectable appetizers, sumptuous sides, and exquisite desserts.
USDA Prime Signature Meats
At El Toro Churrascaria, we pride ourselves on offering USDA Prime beef, renowned for its superior marbling, tenderness, and flavor. Our menu features a variety of signature cuts, each meticulously prepared to highlight the natural richness of the meat.
Signature Cuts
Picada
: A tantalizing mix of tender beef pieces, perfect for sharing.
Picada Wagyu
: An elevated version of our classic picada, made with premium Wagyu beef.
Tomahawk
: A visually stunning and flavorful ribeye steak with a long bone handle.
Porterhouse Steak
: Combining the tenderness of filet mignon and the rich flavor of a New York strip.
Filet Mignon: The most tender cut of beef, offering a buttery texture and subtle flavor.
Ribeye
: Known for its rich marbling and robust flavor.
T-Bone
: A classic cut that combines the best of both worlds – the strip and the tenderloin.
Toro Picada
: A house special blend of our finest meats.
Churrasco Prime Fajitas
: Succulent, marinated beef served sizzling hot.
Signature Meats By The Pound
For those who prefer to enjoy our premium meats at home, we offer our signature cuts by the pound. Select from our range of prime and Wagyu options, all expertly prepared and packaged for your convenience.
Appetizers
Start your meal with our carefully curated appetizers, designed to whet your appetite and set the stage for the main course.
Octopus
: Grilled to perfection, served with a zesty chimichurri sauce.
Wagyu Tostones
: Crispy plantain rounds topped with succulent Wagyu beef.
Tuna Tataki
: Lightly seared tuna, served with a soy-ginger dressing.
Bone Marrow
: Rich, roasted marrow, perfect for spreading on toast.
Wagyu Dumplings
: Delicate dumplings filled with flavorful Wagyu beef.
Frituritas De Malanga
: Crisp taro fritters, a Cuban delicacy.
Manchego Croquettes
: Golden-fried croquettes filled with creamy Manchego cheese.
And More
: Explore our full list of appetizers, each crafted to delight your palate.
Specials
Our specials highlight seasonal ingredients and chef’s innovations, offering a fresh take on our classic dishes. Ask your server for today’s specials.
Luxury Meats
For the ultimate indulgence, our Luxury Meats selection features the finest Wagyu and Japanese A5 Wagyu beef, celebrated worldwide for its exquisite marbling and unparalleled flavor.
Wagyu Picanha
: A Brazilian favorite, known for its rich flavor and tender texture.
Wagyu Entrana / Outside Skirt
: A juicy and flavorful cut, perfect for grilling.
Wagyu Ribeye
: Exceptional marbling and robust flavor, a true steak lover’s delight.
Wagyu Filet Mignon
: The pinnacle of tenderness, with a delicate flavor profile.
Wagyu Tomahawk
: A show-stopping cut that is as impressive in taste as it is in presentation.
A5 NY Strip
: Authentic Japanese A5 Wagyu, with a certificate of authenticity. This steak offers a buttery, delicate umami flavor and unmatched softness.
Sandwiches & Burgers
Our Sandwiches & Burgers menu offers hearty options that are perfect for a casual meal.
Wagyu Beef Hot Dog
: A gourmet twist on a classic favorite.
Lobster Bisque
: A rich, creamy soup loaded with succulent lobster meat.
Sides
Complement your main course with our selection of sides, each crafted to enhance your dining experience.
Sweet Kale Salad
: A refreshing mix of kale, dried cranberries, and a tangy vinaigrette.
Truffle French Fries
: Crispy fries seasoned with truffle oil and Parmesan cheese.
Grilled Pineapple
: Sweet and smoky, a perfect palate cleanser.
Brisket Tamal
: A flavorful tamale stuffed with tender brisket.
Truffle Mac & Cheese
: Creamy, cheesy, and indulgent, with a hint of truffle.
Desserts
End your meal on a sweet note with our delectable desserts, each designed to satisfy your cravings.
Flan
: A creamy caramel custard that melts in your mouth.
Tres Leches
: A moist cake soaked in three types of milk, topped with whipped cream.
Churros
: Crisp on the outside, soft on the inside, served with a rich chocolate dipping sauce.
And More
: Discover our full range of desserts for the perfect finale to your meal.
Catering & Signature Sauces
El Toro Churrascaria also offers catering services for your special events, bringing our signature flavors to your gatherings. Enhance your meals with our range of signature sauces, crafted to complement our meats perfectly.
Meet Chef Aldo
All our culinary creations are brought to life by Chef Aldo Espinosa. Born and raised in Havana, Cuba, Aldo developed a passion for barbecue at a young age. His journey from a food truck in Sweetwater to running multiple successful locations is a testament to his dedication and love for the craft. Today, El Toro Churrascaria stands as a beacon of quality and taste, thanks to Aldo’s commitment to excellence.
El Toro Churrascaria invites you to explore the best meats of the world, from USDA Prime beef to luxurious Wagyu and Japanese A5 Wagyu. Join us for an unforgettable dining experience, where every dish is a testament to our passion for quality and flavor. Welcome to El Toro Churrascaria – where the finest beef on earth is served at an affordable price.
Read more
Energy, flavor, and a Miami twist—welcome to El Toro Loco.
Subscribe
El Toro Loco Steakhouse
El Toro Loco has expanded in many different directions with one common goal. To bring energy and quality to every business venture. From MMA to Home & Design, you can be sure here at El Toro Loco we will add our Miami twist. Our biggest project yet is coming very soon.

El Toro Steakhouse Menu
We are El Toro Steakhouse, where culinary mastery meets unparalleled quality. Our Steakhouse Menu is crafted to tantalize your taste buds with the finest selections of USDA Prime Signature Meats, delectable appetizers, sumptuous sides, and exquisite desserts.
USDA Prime Signature Meats
At El Toro Churrascaria, we pride ourselves on offering USDA Prime beef, renowned for its superior marbling, tenderness, and flavor. Our menu features a variety of signature cuts, each meticulously prepared to highlight the natural richness of the meat.
Signature Cuts
Picada
: A tantalizing mix of tender beef pieces, perfect for sharing.
Picada Wagyu
: An elevated version of our classic picada, made with premium Wagyu beef.
Tomahawk
: A visually stunning and flavorful ribeye steak with a long bone handle.
Porterhouse Steak
: Combining the tenderness of filet mignon and the rich flavor of a New York strip.
Filet Mignon: The most tender cut of beef, offering a buttery texture and subtle flavor.
Ribeye
: Known for its rich marbling and robust flavor.
T-Bone
: A classic cut that combines the best of both worlds – the strip and the tenderloin.
Toro Picada
: A house special blend of our finest meats.
Churrasco Prime Fajitas
: Succulent, marinated beef served sizzling hot.
Signature Meats By The Pound
For those who prefer to enjoy our premium meats at home, we offer our signature cuts by the pound. Select from our range of prime and Wagyu options, all expertly prepared and packaged for your convenience.
Appetizers
Start your meal with our carefully curated appetizers, designed to whet your appetite and set the stage for the main course.
Octopus
: Grilled to perfection, served with a zesty chimichurri sauce.
Wagyu Tostones
: Crispy plantain rounds topped with succulent Wagyu beef.
Tuna Tataki
: Lightly seared tuna, served with a soy-ginger dressing.
Bone Marrow
: Rich, roasted marrow, perfect for spreading on toast.
Wagyu Dumplings
: Delicate dumplings filled with flavorful Wagyu beef.
Frituritas De Malanga
: Crisp taro fritters, a Cuban delicacy.
Manchego Croquettes
: Golden-fried croquettes filled with creamy Manchego cheese.
And More
: Explore our full list of appetizers, each crafted to delight your palate.
Specials
Our specials highlight seasonal ingredients and chef’s innovations, offering a fresh take on our classic dishes. Ask your server for today’s specials.
Luxury Meats
For the ultimate indulgence, our Luxury Meats selection features the finest Wagyu and Japanese A5 Wagyu beef, celebrated worldwide for its exquisite marbling and unparalleled flavor.
Wagyu Picanha
: A Brazilian favorite, known for its rich flavor and tender texture.
Wagyu Entrana / Outside Skirt
: A juicy and flavorful cut, perfect for grilling.
Wagyu Ribeye
: Exceptional marbling and robust flavor, a true steak lover’s delight.
Wagyu Filet Mignon
: The pinnacle of tenderness, with a delicate flavor profile.
Wagyu Tomahawk
: A show-stopping cut that is as impressive in taste as it is in presentation.
A5 NY Strip
: Authentic Japanese A5 Wagyu, with a certificate of authenticity. This steak offers a buttery, delicate umami flavor and unmatched softness.
Sandwiches & Burgers
Our Sandwiches & Burgers menu offers hearty options that are perfect for a casual meal.
Wagyu Beef Hot Dog
: A gourmet twist on a classic favorite.
Lobster Bisque
: A rich, creamy soup loaded with succulent lobster meat.
Sides
Complement your main course with our selection of sides, each crafted to enhance your dining experience.
Sweet Kale Salad
: A refreshing mix of kale, dried cranberries, and a tangy vinaigrette.
Truffle French Fries
: Crispy fries seasoned with truffle oil and Parmesan cheese.
Grilled Pineapple
: Sweet and smoky, a perfect palate cleanser.
Brisket Tamal
: A flavorful tamale stuffed with tender brisket.
Truffle Mac & Cheese
: Creamy, cheesy, and indulgent, with a hint of truffle.
Desserts
End your meal on a sweet note with our delectable desserts, each designed to satisfy your cravings.
Flan
: A creamy caramel custard that melts in your mouth.
Tres Leches
: A moist cake soaked in three types of milk, topped with whipped cream.
Churros
: Crisp on the outside, soft on the inside, served with a rich chocolate dipping sauce.
And More
: Discover our full range of desserts for the perfect finale to your meal.
Catering & Signature Sauces
El Toro Churrascaria also offers catering services for your special events, bringing our signature flavors to your gatherings. Enhance your meals with our range of signature sauces, crafted to complement our meats perfectly.
Meet Chef Aldo
All our culinary creations are brought to life by Chef Aldo Espinosa. Born and raised in Havana, Cuba, Aldo developed a passion for barbecue at a young age. His journey from a food truck in Sweetwater to running multiple successful locations is a testament to his dedication and love for the craft. Today, El Toro Churrascaria stands as a beacon of quality and taste, thanks to Aldo’s commitment to excellence.
El Toro Churrascaria invites you to explore the best meats of the world, from USDA Prime beef to luxurious Wagyu and Japanese A5 Wagyu. Join us for an unforgettable dining experience, where every dish is a testament to our passion for quality and flavor. Welcome to El Toro Churrascaria – where the finest beef on earth is served at an affordable price.
Read more
Energy, flavor, and a Miami twist—welcome to El Toro Loco.

El Toro Loco Steakhouse
El Toro Loco has expanded in many different directions with one common goal. To bring energy and quality to every business venture. From MMA to Home & Design, you can be sure here at El Toro Loco we will add our Miami twist. Our biggest project yet is coming very soon.

ENTRADAS / STARTERS
Croquetas de Bacalao / Cod Croquettes
Doradas y crujientes por fuera, con un relleno cremoso y sabroso de bacalao salado que se funde en el paladar con un delicado toque marino.
Golden and crispy on the outside, with a creamy, savory filling of salted cod that melts on the palate with a delicate touch of the sea.
$15
Croquetas de Jamón y Chorizo / Ham & Chorizo Croquettes
Crujientes por fuera, estas croquetas revelan un relleno sedoso lleno de la intensidad ahumada del chorizo y la riqueza sabrosa del jamón, dejando un cálido y persistente toque picante en el paladar.
Crisp on the outside, these croquettes reveal a silky filling bursting with the smoky depth of chorizo and the savory richness of jamón, leaving a warm, lingering spice on the palate.
$15
Croquetas de Manchego / Manchego Croquettes
Ligeramente crujientes por fuera, con un centro cremoso y delicioso que libera el aroma a nuez y mantequilla del Manchego añejo, con un final suave y sabroso en el paladar.
Lightly crisp on the outside, with a luscious, creamy center that releases the nutty, buttery aroma of aged Manchego, leaving a smooth and savory finish on the palate.
$15
Hummus con Zanahorias Baby y Chips de Pita / Hummus with Baby Carrots & Pita Chips
Hummus suave y aterciopelado, rico en garbanzos terrosos y un toque de limón, acompañado de la dulzura crujiente de zanahorias baby y la textura satisfactoria de chips de pita tibios.
Smooth and velvety hummus, rich with earthy chickpeas and a hint of tangy lemon, paired with the crisp sweetness of baby carrots and the satisfying crunch of warm pita chips.
$12
Guacamole La Rosa con Queso a la Parrilla / Guacamole La Rosa with Grilled Cheese
Guacamole cremoso y cítrico con lima fresca y cilantro, perfectamente acompañado de queso a la parrilla dorado y fundido que aporta un toque ahumado y rico en cada bocado.
Creamy, zesty guacamole bursting with fresh lime and cilantro, perfectly paired with warm, golden grilled cheese that adds a smoky, melty richness to every bite.
$17
Guacamole con Picanha / Guacamole Picanha
Guacamole sedoso con jugosa picanha a la brasa, combinando frescura cremosa con una riqueza ahumada y sabrosa que perdura en el paladar.
Silky guacamole layered with juicy, flame-kissed picanha, blending creamy freshness with a smoky, savory richness that lingers on the palate.
$24
Coliflor a la Parrilla con Hummus y Pesto / Grilled Cauliflower with Hummus & Pesto
Coliflor asada a la perfección, tierna y ahumada, acompañada de hummus cremoso y un estallido aromático de pesto fresco.
Charred to perfection, tender cauliflower meets the earthy creaminess of hummus and the vibrant, aromatic burst of fresh pesto.
$20
Dip de Espinaca y Alcachofa / Spinach & Artichoke Dip
Mezcla cálida y aterciopelada de espinaca tierna y alcachofas ácidas, fundidas en queso cremoso para un bocado rico y reconfortante.
A warm, velvety blend of tender spinach and tangy artichokes, folded into creamy cheese for a rich, indulgent bite with every scoop.
$18
Ceviche de Branzino / Branzino Ceviche
Delicado branzino curado en cítricos, con frescura vibrante y un sutil dulzor marino que despierta el paladar.
Delicate branzino cured in citrus, with a bright, zesty freshness and a subtle oceanic sweetness that awakens the palate.
$28
Carpaccio de Res / Beef Carpaccio
Láminas finísimas de res tierna que se deshacen en la boca, enriquecidas con un toque de aceite de oliva y un susurro de especias.
Paper-thin slices of tender beef melt on the tongue, enriched with a drizzle of olive oil and a whisper of spice.
$24
Tiradito de Salmón / Salmon Tiradito
Salmón estilo sashimi bañado en una salsa cítrica, suave, vibrante y refrescante en cada bocado.
Sashimi-style salmon draped in a tangy citrus sauce, smooth and vibrant with every refreshing bite.
Buttery salmon with a silky texture, balanced by fresh citrus and a touch of herbal brightness.
$30
Tortilla Española (Clásica o con Chorizo) / Spanish Tortilla (Plain or with Chorizo)
Capas esponjosas de papa y huevo, doradas y reconfortantes, con opción de chorizo ahumado para un extra de sabor.
Fluffy layers of potato and egg, comforting and golden, with the option of smoky chorizo for an extra savory depth.
$20
Tabla de Charcutería (para 2) / Charcuterie Board (serves 2)
Selección artesanal de embutidos y quesos curados, en perfecta armonía de texturas, aromas y sabores intensos.
An artisanal selection of cured meats and cheeses, offering a perfect harmony of textures, aromas, and bold, lingering flavors.
$30
ENSALADAS Y BOWLS / SALADS AND BOWLS
La Rosa Sandía / La Rosa Watermelon
Sandía jugosa con rúcula picante y queso feta cremoso, fresca y brillante.
Juicy watermelon with peppery arugula and creamy feta, refreshing and bright.
$18
Ensalada César / Caesar Salad
Crujiente lechuga romana con aderezo César cremoso y un toque crocante.
Crisp romaine tossed in creamy Caesar dressing with a savory crunch.
$18
Ensalada de Burrata / Burrata Salad
Burrata aterciopelada con tomates heirloom, rúcula, pesto y glaseado balsámico dulce.
Velvety burrata with heirloom tomatoes, arugula, pesto, and a sweet balsamic glaze.
$29
Ensalada Thai Picada / Chop Thai Salad
Verduras y hojas frescas con aderezo agridulce de inspiración tailandesa.
Crisp vegetables and greens with a tangy-sweet Thai-inspired dressing.
$17
Ensalada de Pollo BBQ / BBQ Chicken Salad
Pollo a la parrilla ahumado sobre hojas frescas, con intensos sabores de barbacoa dulce.
Smoky grilled chicken over fresh greens with bold, sweet barbecue flavors.
$25
Bowl Mexicano / Mexican Bowl
Pollo, arroz, aguacate, frijoles, maíz rostizado y totopos con aderezo de cilantro.
A hearty mix of chicken, rice, avocado, beans, roasted corn, and tortilla chips with zesty cilantro dressing.
$25
Bowl Cubano / Cuban Bowl
Cerdo deshebrado con arroz, plátanos maduros, aguacate, frijoles y jitomate fresco en aderezo de cilantro.
Savory pulled pork layered with rice, sweet plantains, avocado, beans, and fresh tomato in cilantro dressing.
$25
Bowl de Salmón / Salmon Bowl
Salmón a la parrilla sobre arroz y hojas frescas con aguacate y toppings vibrantes.
Grilled salmon over rice and greens with avocado and fresh, vibrant toppings.
$28
Bowl de Atún Picante / Spicy Tuna Bowl
Atún con arroz, vegetales crujientes y un toque picante en cada bocado.
Zesty tuna with rice, crisp vegetables, and a spicy kick in every bite.
$28
DE LA PARRILLA / FROM THE GRILL
Filete Mignon Prime al Fuego  / Prime Filet Mignon on Fire
Tierno filete mignon flameado sobre sal del Himalaya para un acabado ahumado y mantequilloso.
Tender filet mignon flame-grilled over Himalayan salt for a smoky, buttery finish.
$62
Picanha Prime al Fuego  / Prime Picanha on Fire
Jugosa picanha sellada sobre sal del Himalaya, rica en sabor intenso.
Juicy picanha seared over Himalayan salt, rich with bold, savory flavor.
$44
Tomahawk Prime al Fuego  / Prime Tomahawk on Fire
Corte Tomahawk flameado sobre sal del Himalaya con sabor profundo y robusto.
Impressive tomahawk steak, flame-kissed on Himalayan salt with deep, robust taste.
$165
Filete Mignon Prime La Rosa  / Prime Filet Mignon La Rosa
Filete jugoso, a la parrilla a la perfección con sabor refinado.
Melt-in-your-mouth filet, grilled to perfection with refined, delicate flavor.
$58
Picanha Prime La Rosa  / Prime Picanha La Rosa
Corte clásico de picanha, jugoso y lleno de sabor.
Classic picanha cut, juicy and flavorful with every tender bite.
$38
Costillas La Rosa  / La Rosa Ribs
Costillas a la parrilla, ahumadas y tiernas con glaseado dulce y salado.
Slow-grilled ribs, smoky and succulent with a sweet, savory glaze.
$32
Salmón a la Parrilla  / Grilled Salmon
Salmón sellado al fuego, tierno y mantequilloso con un toque cítrico.
Flame-seared salmon, tender and buttery with a hint of citrus brightness.
$33
Pulpo a la Parrilla  / Grilled Octopus
Pulpo asado, tierno y ahumado con delicada esencia marina.
Charred octopus, smoky and tender with a delicate ocean essence.
$33
Camarones al Ajillo  / Shrimp Scampi
Camarones salteados en mantequilla de ajo con un toque de limón.
Plump shrimp sautéed in garlic butter, vibrant with a splash of lemon.
$35
Mar y Tierra  / Surf & Turf
Carne tierna con la riqueza del mar.
A perfect surf and turf, combining tender steak with buttery seafood richness.
$70
Filete de Branzino  / Branzino Filet
Branzino ligero y escamoso, a la parrilla con sabor fresco.
Light and flaky branzino, grilled with a clean, fresh ocean flavor.
$32
Pollo Margarita a la Parrilla  / Grill Chicken Margherita
Pechuga de pollo jugosa con jitomate fresco, mozzarella y albahaca.
Juicy grilled chicken topped with fresh tomato, mozzarella, and basil.
$29

Mezcla fresca de hojas verdes con un toque crujiente y refrescante.
Crisp mixed greens with a light, refreshing crunch.

Creamy avocado with zesty lime and fresh herbs.

Slow-cooked pork, tender and juicy with a smoky-sweet finish.

Pulpo asado, ahumado y tierno con un bocado marino delicado.
Charred octopus, smoky and tender with a delicate ocean bite.

Res a la parrilla, jugosa y sabrosa con sabor intenso.
Grilled steak, savory and succulent with bold, meaty flavor.

Taco de Coliflor al Chipotle / Chipotle Cauliflower Taco
Coliflor rostizada con un toque ahumado de chipotle y un toque dulce.
Roasted cauliflower with smoky chipotle heat and a hint of sweetness.

Queso derretido, cremoso y con un sabor indulgente.
Warm, gooey cheese with a rich, indulgent touch.

Pasta Vodka Love
Pasta en salsa cremosa de vodka y jitomate con albahaca fragante.
Pasta tossed in creamy vodka-tomato sauce with fragrant basil.

Pasta Cremosa de Limón / Creamy Lemon Pasta

Silky lemon cream sauce with tender chicken and Parmesan.

Calamares, camarones, mejillones y almejas en un rico festín marino.
Calamari, shrimp, mussels, and clams in a rich, coastal medley.

Light and wholesome gluten-free pasta option.

Home
Anya
2025-04-29T17:07:17+00:00
The Boiling Crab Home
For some reason, people think fishermen like to tell stories. Well, our fishermen don’t. While all the other crabbers and captains were packed into the local bar boozing and swapping sea tales, ours were back home, playing with spices and boiling the best of their fresh catch for the family. Ok, they were probably drinking too. We haven’t been telling our story since 2004, but we do write it down almost every day. It’s written in Sha-bang sauce all over your bib and with beer spilt across the table. Every face in here has our story written on it in smiles and smears. Because the best stories aren’t just told, they’re tasted and lived.

On the Menu
Sun Kissed Flavors of Europe
Experience a carefully curated menu with seasonal specials
A Culinary Escape
Welcome to Paradise—a refined dining experience inspired by the vibrant, sun-kissed flavors of the Mediterranean.
Our thoughtfully curated menu invites you to slow down and
savor
every bite, from traditional Greek spreads and fresh crudos to handmade pastas and expertly crafted dishes from land and sea. Each plate blends bold flavors with
elegant

Contact Us
The story of Jazz has French Afro-Caribbean, Spanish and American influence.
Jazz was born in New Orleans, USA in the early 1700 hundred.
About Our
Menu
Menu with Integrity:
Our menu uses only the finest organic ingredients and supports local farmers by sourcing quality vegetables and produce. We are committed to freshness and homemade quality, crafting all our sauces from scratch. We prioritize health and sustainability by avoiding added hormones, artificial preservatives, colorants, and antibiotics.
Inspired by the rich history of Jazz, our menu blends French cuisine with eclectic fusions from Afro-Caribbean, Spanish, and North American culinary traditions. We cater to diverse dietary needs by offering gluten-free and vegetarian options, ensuring there’s something delightful for every guest.

About the Business
J. Alexander's in Plantation is a modern American eatery rooted in wood-fired cooking and a passion for quality. Our focus is simple: great food, genuine service, and an experience that feels both elevated and easygoing. The menu features fresh takes on American classics -- flavorful entrees, expertly grilled steaks, slow-roasted prime rib, seasonal seafood, stacked sandwiches, and bold salads. We keep things interesting with rotating chef-driven features that highlight the best of each season. At the bar, you'll find a curated wine list and crafted cocktails, perfect for pairing or unwinding.

El Mago de las Fritas
Our Menu
Delivery Options
Press
News
Contact
El Mago de las Fritas
Our Menu
Delivery Options
Press
News
Contact
Welcome To
El Mago de las Fritas
BY
Martha and Ortelio Cardenas
Ortelio and Eva Cardenas have been making the classic «Cuban Frita» since the 1950’s in Cuba where Ortelio Cardenas was coined as "El Mago" when making fritas.
With the rise of the Cuban Revolution, the Cardenas family moved to Miami, FL bringing their tradition with them, thus, opening El Mago de las Fritas in 1984.
What is a
Cuban Frita?
A Cuban Frita is a unique interpretation of a hamburger with ground beef and chorizo blend patty with cooked & raw onions topped with potato wisps, all sandwiched between Cuban bread.
El Mago de las Fritas has its doors open in Miami to locals and tourists alike for over 35 years. Cardenas is now accompanied by his daughter, Martha Cardenas in operating this beloved hidden gem nestled in 8th street.
While the classic Cuban Frita is their specialty, the family has created various modern & innovative variations of the frita along with unique hot dogs, bowls & more! With their core based in family, the Cardenas’ treat every customer like a member of their own family.
Our Menu
We know there are many options and we are so happy you have allowed us to be part of your day.
As Mago says- "if you do not like the food tell Mago if you do like it tell the world!"
View Menu
Delivery Options
Hungry but don't want to go out? Don't worry! Now you can place your orders through Uber Eats and DoorDash right from our website. Enjoy your favorite dishes without leaving home. The delicious food you love, just a click away!
press
burgerbeast.com
El Mago De Las Fritas has made its home in Miami on 8th street (Calle Ocho) since 1984, though it’s not the only frita place on Calle Ocho. Four of the five old-school Frita Cubana Joints (
El Mago de las Fritas,
El Rey de las Fritas
,
Fritas Domino
&
La Palma
) are on Calle Ocho.
Read More
miaminewtimes.com
But you’re not here for just any dish. You’re here for the Cuban hamburgers, AKA fritas. From the orange-hued beef chorizo patties to the almost-too-soft Cuban rolls and the topping of handmade potato sticks,
Read More
miami.eater.com
A longstanding favorite part of El Mago de Las Fritas’s no-frills food experience is a list of Cuban-inspired hot dogs
Read More
timeout.com
Miami’s frita OG is recognized around the world for its perfectly cooked Cuban hamburgers—featuring a heavily spiced patty made of pork and beef that’s sandwiched between buttery Cuban bread and topped with a heaping pile of shoestring potatoes
Read More
miamiherald.com
During the lunch rush on the day before a street would be named in his honor, Ortelio Cárdenas was working the deep fryer and calling out orders — four days shy of his 81
st
birthday.

About the Business
Tap 42 is a Craft Beer Bar & Kitchen featuring modern interpretations of gastropub fare with 42 Craft Beers to choose from. Tap 42 was among the first concepts in South Florida to combine signature architectural design with a chef-driven menu and craft beer and cocktail beverage program. As a go-to spot for young professionals, Tap 42 also offers Ladies' Night on Wednesday and Bottomless Brunch on Saturday and Sunday. Please note that indoor and outdoor seating is determined by a first come, first served basis. Thank you!

Book Now
The Magic of Elcielo Arrives in New York
book now
Our Restaurants
New York City
Washington D.C
Miami
Medellín
Bogotá
Welcome to Elcielo Restaurant
Elcielo Restaurant, Founded by Michelin-starred chef Juan Manuel Barrientos, renowned for his creativity and innovation.  Is a culinary sanctuary where the mastery of Colombian flavors is fused with the most cutting-edge cooking techniques, creating a symphony of unique aromas and textures. This exquisite proposition is designed to delight diners with a fine dining experience that dares to defy the conventional. Here, the magic begins with the meticulous selection of the freshest ingredients, sourced locally and seasonally, to pleasantly surprise even the most discerning palates. Each tasting menu at Elcielo is a sensory journey, meticulously crafted to elicit emotions and stimulate the senses. The stories are seamlessly intertwined with the artistic presentation, transforming every dish into a masterpiece. Elcielo Restaurant is a true treasure on the international gastronomic scene, with a standard of excellence that ranks it among the best in the world.
MICHELIN GUIDE
Since the beginning, we dreamed of the possibility that a Colombian cuisine restaurant could ascend to the gastronomic firmament with its own Michelin Star. Today, that dream has materialized, consolidating the prestige of our Elcielo restaurants, awarded the coveted Michelin Star, a symbol of global excellence.
These accolades are testimonies to our relentless pursuit of perfection, demonstrating that the refinement and innovation of our cuisine can conquer the world’s most discerning palates. This recognition not only elevates our flag but also reinforces our commitment to continue shining with more stars. We deeply thank our patrons and the entire Elcielo Hospitality Group family, whose talent and passion make this legacy of excellence possible. This achievement is a tribute to the unwavering spirit of our team, which has led Elcielo Restaurant to transcend borders.
JUANMA
Chef & Business Man
Juan Manuel Barrientos, known in the gastronomic world as Juanma, is the creator, founder, and executive chef of Elcielo Restaurant, with locations in Medellín, Bogotá, Miami, and Washington, D.C. The latter became, in 2021, the first modern Colombian cuisine restaurant to be awarded the coveted Michelin star. At 40 years old, Juanma is internationally recognized as one of Colombia's most influential entrepreneurs and peace leaders. He has been celebrated three consecutive times as the youngest chef in Latin America’s 50 Best and was included in the prestigious The World’s Best Chef list in 2016.
As a speaker and businessman within the Elcielo Hospitality Group, Juanma shares his unique vision, innovative spirit, and philanthropic commitment through the Elcielo Foundation, which earned him the Global Gift Philanthropist Award in 2020 from the Art & Hope Foundation in Marbella, Spain, for his humanitarian work. He is also the creator of the restaurants La Sere by Juanma, El Bistró by Juanma, Cartagena by Juanma, Cuon, Kaime, among others, as well as the prestigious luxury hotel Elcielo Hotel in Medellín. Follow him on @juanmaelcielo to learn more about our chef.

Indulge in a Mediterranean inspired three-course menu at Boulud Sud Miami
Perfectly paired with a bottle of Jilguerin from Ribera del Duero
All of October 12pm to 2:30pm & 6pm to 9pm $100 per couple including tax & gratuity

Whether you’ve got a hankering for a tiramisu waffle, Cuban sandwich, fish n chips, double bacon cheeseburger or kiwi matcha tea bowl, Cafe Americano has you covered with your favorite comfort food and cocktail.
Featuring an incredible new menu for guests to indulge in including South Florida-inspired dishes that are exclusive to the restaurant’s Miami locations such as the
Tropical Ceviche
made with golden corvina and shrimp, tossed with coconut milk, passion fruit, mango, red onion, red pepper, aji amarillo, cilantro, crispy corn, giant corn and sweet potato;
Guacamole & Chips
, made with fresh Hass avocados, cilantro, tomato, onion and plated with blue corn tortilla chips; and slow
Smoked Baby Back Ribs
served in a root beer BBQ sauce with french fries and corn on the cob, also offering an extensive
New York style pizza
menu where guests can create their own pies &
All Day Breakfast
.
Towering dishes filled with savory favorites include the
Seafood Feast
, stacked with tropical ceviche, seared Florida lobster tail, whole fried Florida snapper, grilled Madagascar shrimp, clarified butter and Cajun remoulade; and
The Tower
, which comes with spice brined chicken wings, smoked baby back ribs, NOLA BBQ shrimp, french fries and onion rings.

name: Hasalon Miami
raw_text:
HaSalon Miami
Skip to content
About
Menu
Hours & Info
RESERVE THE HOLIDAYS
PRIVATE EVENTS
RESERVATIONS
HaSalon
Scroll to next section
The world’s most famous Mediterranean restaurant… In Miami Beach
In 2021, the hitmakers behind Carbone and ZZ’s Club joined forces with renowned Israeli chef Eyal Shani to bring his signature concept HaSalon to the heart of Miami Beach. Discover a style of Mediterranean cuisine that is impossibly generous and alive, along with a bacchanalian vibe that makes this a restaurant like no other.
Chef Eyal Shani
Shani was born in Jerusalem in 1959. His culinary passion was first instilled in him by his grandfather, an agronomist and a dedicated vegan, who exposed him to local markets, fields, and vineyards from a young age.
In 1989 he opened his first restaurant "Oceanus" in his home town of Jerusalem. There, he developed a unique culinary language based on regional Mediterranean products: olive oil, fish, tahini, fresh seasonal vegetables and of course, the tomato.
The Cuisine
From the HaSalon’s signature open kitchen, Shani’s chefs prepare an extravagant parade of bright salads, vibrant vegetable dishes, satisfying pastas, and show-stopping courses meant for sharing, such as whole fish and roasted meats. Menu selections change according to the seasons and the restaurant’s restless creativity, but HaSalon's famous emphasis on generous flavors, full of life, is always on display.
Menu
EARLY EVENING
DINNER
Select a Menu
The Experience
HaSalon may have been born in Tel Aviv, but it was made for the Magic City, delivering the nightly supper club atmosphere that has made it a global sensation.
PHOTO CREDIT: @joshua_kane_photography
Private Events
HASALON features two elegant private dining rooms, a stylish covered patio, and a dramatic main dining room with soaring vaulted ceilings and a striking open kitchen. Every space can be reserved for private events, available seven days a week.
All events are entirely custom-built, depending on the preferences and needs of your occasion and group.
Please email events@hasalonmiami.com or fill out our Event Form for more information.
PHOTO CREDIT: @joshua_kane_photography
Major Food Group
Founded a decade ago by Jeff Zalaznick, Chef Mario Carbone, and Chef Rich Torrisi, Major Food Group has consistently delivered the most celebrated, innovative, and exciting culinary experiences in the world. Together, the three visionary leaders deliver exceptional, delicious food and hospitality concepts that delight guests, define categories and, while creating distinguishable sense of place in every city, establish new standards for the industry.
While each brand this creative team brings to life is distinct, they all reflect MFG’s refined, celebratory, and thoroughly contemporary approach to its craft.
Join Our Newsletter
Sign up to hear about exciting new updates from HaSalon and Major Food Group.
Hours & Information
404 Washington Ave
Miami Beach, FL 33139

*Last seating is at 10:00pm.

About the Business
Motek Miami Beach brings a modern Kosher-style dining experience to the vibrant, sun-soaked energy of the area. Just steps away from the ocean, it’s the perfect spot to refuel after a day in the sun. Savor fresh, small-batch hummus, crispy falafel, or our award-winning Arayes Burger in a lively, inviting atmosphere.

raw_text:

All Day Menu
Our menu is never done
Every dish at Layali Miami has it’s own story from the traditional recipes direct from Lebanon, to modern updates that tell the history of our team, of our cooks and chefs who have left their mark on our kitchen, and our serving staff and managers who have been ambassadors of hospitality. Our menu is never done – we find inspiration all around, in new ingredients, new approaches, and fresh takes on old standards.
Appetizers
Hummus
A blend of chickpeas with sesame sauce and lemon juice
3 Hummus Combination
Spicy, meat & chicken
Zaatar (Manaeesh)
Dough topped with thyme mixed with olive oil & served with tomato slices
Malfouf
Stuffed cabbage leaves with rice & meat cooked with lemon juice & olive oil
Moutabel ( Baba Ghamouj)
Grilled eggplant blended with sesame purée and lemon juice
Al Rahib
Smoked eggplant blended with fresh lemon juice and garlic.
Chicken Wings
Marinated in garlic and lemon sauce,
charcoal grilled
Warak Jnab (Dawali)
Grape leaves stuffed with rice, your choice of meat or vegetables
Labneh
Homemade condensed yogurt served with olive oil and hint of mint
Shanklish
Homemade cheese balls topped with olive oil and thyme, served with diced onions and tomatoes
Chicken Liver
Sauteed chicken liver mixed with cilantro, garlic, onion, lemon juice, olive oil and spices.
Muhamara
A blend of red pepper, walnut & pomegranate sauce
Lemon Cauliflower
Seasoned fried & served with lemony tahini sauce
Shawarma Bites
Marinated beef or chicken roasted slowly served with lettuce, tomatoes, onion, pickles and tahini sauce rolled in pita bread & served in mini bites
Arayes
Ground beef mixed with onions & parsley, grilled in pita bread
Falafel
A spicy mixture of ground chickpeas, cilantro, parsley and onions, deep fried and served with tahini sauce
Kibbe
Crushed wheat blended with meat and stuffed with onions, pine nuts, and ground meat.
Foul Moudamas
Fava bean mixed with lemon juice, mint, garlic and olive oil
Kibbe Nayeh
Fresh raw meat blended with crushed wheat and spices
Sanbousik
Our homemade dough stuffed with choice of meat or cheese
Makanek
Middle Eastern sausage fried & served with lemon juice and garlic
Soujouk
Spicy homemade sausages cooked with lemon juice and garlic
Mujaddarah (Lentil Rice)
Rice and lentils cooked together, topped with fried onions and served with homemade yogurt
Garlic Dip
Our homemade garlic dip
Batata Harra
Spicy potato cubes, chopped cilantro, garlic & pepper
Appetizers Combo (Meza)
Create your own combo by choosing five appetizers or salads
Octopus
Grilled  octopus served with roasted potatoes and chimichurri sauce
Salads & Soup
Tabbouleh Salad
Chopped parsley, mint, tomatoes, onion, and crushed wheat. Blended with olive oil and onions.
Layali Fattoush Salad
Toasted pita bread pits with lettuce, tomatoes, cucumber, onions, green pepper, radish, parsley topped with our house dressing
Tomato Salad
Slices of tomatoes with balsamic vinegar and olive oil topped with feta cheese.
Greek Salad
Lettuce, tomato, cucumber, green pepper, black olives, onions topped with feta cheese, and served with house dressing.
Yogurt Cucumber Salad
Chopped cucumber and mint mixed with homemade yogurt.
Arabic Salad
Chopped tomatoes, green peppers, and cucumber with tahini sauce.
Lentil Soup
Lentil soup spiced with garlic, cumin, and topped with fried onion.
Entrees
Veggie Mezza Combo
Hummus, falafel, Baba ghanouj, vegetarian grape leaves, and tabbouleh salad.
Meat Mazza Combo
Hummus, Baba ghanounsh, meat grape leaves, tabbouleh salad, and fried kibbe.
Meat Kafta Kabab
Two skewers of select cut ground seasoned beef mixed with parsley and onions served with angel hair rice & marinated onions.
Chicken Kafta Kabab
Two skewers of select cut ground chicken blended with parsley and onions. Served with angel hair rice, and marinated onion.
Shish Kabab
Two skewers of tender marinated beef served with angel hair rice and marinated onion.
Chicken Kabab (Shish Tawook)
Two skewers of boneless, skinless marinated chicken breast served with angel hair rice, and marinated onion.
Lamb Kabab
Two skewers of tender marinated lamb served with angel hair rice and marinated onion.
Beef Shawarma
Marinated beef, roasted slowly, served with Greek salad or angel hair rice
Chicken Shawarma
Marinated chicken, roasted slowly, served with greek salad or angel hair rice.
Shawarma Combo
Beef and Chicken served with rice or greek salad & tahini sauce
Shrimp Kabab
Two skewers of jumbo shrimp with grilled onions and green peppers, served with angel hair, rice and marinated onions
Layali Lemon Chicken
Slices of boneless, skinless marinated chicken breast with artichoke hearts sauteed in lemon, and garlic. Served with angel hair rice and steamed vegetables.
Rack Of Lamb
Lamb chops , served with angel hair rice and steamed Broccoli
New York Steak
Certified angus beef, served with angel hair rice and steamed vegetables
Mixed Grill
Combination platter of meat, chicken & shish kabab served with angel hair rice & marinated onion
Layali Mediterranean Feast
2 Skewers Shish Kabab, 2 Lamb, 2 Chicken Kabab, 2 Kafta Meat, 2 Kafta Chicken and Rack of Lamb, served with angel hair rice and house salad
Red Snapper
Red snapper, mediterranean seasoning, served with French fries.
Salmon
Grilled  fresh salmon served with grilled vegetables skewers, crispy asparagus and pesto sauce
Veggie Burger
Pretzel bun, lettuce, tomatoes, crispy onions and secret sauce. Served with french fries
Kids Menu

Chicken tenders & french fries

Chicken kabab with rice or fries
I'm Not Hungry
Kafta kabab with rice or fries

About the Business
Business owner information
Alex and Giannis K.
Business Owner
MIAMI, FLA. - (November 2019) - Three years after opening Meraki Greek Bistro on a hidden alley in Downtown Miami, Managing Partner Alex Karavias and Executive Chef Giannis Kotsos have announced the debut of Meraki Coconut Grove located at 3462 Main Highway in Coconut Grove. The second location quietly opened in October, bringing elevated, authentic Greek cuisine and elegant coastal design to area residents and visitors alike. 

"Meraki means to 'put something of yourself into whatever you do', and that's exactly what Chef Giannis and I have been doing since we opened the original Meraki location three years ago," said Alex Karavias. "'I've always dreamed of opening a restaurant here in Coconut Grove, where my first encounters in Miami's culinary scene started years ago, and we are excited to expand the Meraki brand and bring our approachable and authentic Greek cuisine to the community."
…

Our Menu
No Reservations Restaurant and Wine Bar
Welcome to Our Table
At
No Reservations Restaurant and Wine Bar
, founder
Liza Meli
—the passionate restaurateur behind Miami favorites
BarMeli
and
Ouzo’s Greek Taverna
—invites you to experience her newest creation. Open since
May 2023
, “NR” is a cozy, Mediterranean-inspired escape, shaped by Liza’s rich heritage and travels through
Greece, Spain, and Southern France
.
The menu is a celebration of simple, soulful cooking—crafted for sharing, savoring, and pairing with our thoughtfully curated wines. Behind the kitchen magic are
Peruvian Chef siblings Edgar and Ada Delgado
, bringing warmth and authenticity to every dish.
Whether you’re here for a casual evening, a romantic night out, or a solo glass of wine and small bites,
No Reservations
is your neighborhood gem—intimate, eclectic, and always welcoming.
Weekly Highlights:
All-Night Happy Hour – Every Tuesday
Every Day -Happy Hour - 5:00pm  to 7:00pm

Contact
RESERVATIONS
Mediterranean fine dining on the Miami River
Mediterranean fine dining on the Miami River
Mediterranean fine dining on the Miami River
Our Philosophy
CASA  NEOS
Restaurant invites you on a voyage
through the  rich culinary culture and vibrant flavors of the Mediterranean.
Offering a delicious modern cuisine, inspired by the shores of the Mediterranean. The
Miami River restaurant
is open for dinner and weekend lunch, and conveniently accessible
by boat
from the river, through
CASA NEOS Beach Club
.
From homemade bread in a wood-burning oven to fresh whole fish, grilled vegetables, and prime meat, every detail comes together to compose a superb fine dining experience. We take pride in providing the purest and freshest produce, handpicked by the Chefs with care from local and regional small farm producers, to create a culinary experience that delights the senses. The space is also available for
private events
, offering a stunning waterfront setting for celebrations and gatherings of any size.

Traditional Turkish Desserts
Traditional Turkish Desserts
About Doner Kebab
The
Doner Kebab
is a beloved fast-food dish that originated in Turkey. It's known for its rich flavors, succulent meat, and distinctive presentation.
Doner Kebab
: A type of kebab made of meat cooked on a vertical rotisserie.
Shawarma
: Another name for Doner Kebab, widely used in Middle Eastern cuisine. It is also known as
Gyro
.
Vertical Rotisserie
: Cooking method where meat is stacked on a vertical spit and slowly roasted.
Lamb and Beef
: Traditional meat used in Doner Kebab, though chicken, and veal are also common.
Marinade
: A mixture of spices, herbs, and yogurt used to flavor the meat before cooking.
Pita bread
: Bread often used to serve Doner Kebab, along with other types of flatbreads such as
Lavash
to wrap them.
Vegetables
: Fresh ingredients such as tomatoes, onions, lettuce, red cabbage, and cucumbers that accompany the meat.
Sauces
: Various sauces like garlic, spicy, tzatziki, tahini, and hot sauce that add flavor to the kebab.
Street Food
: Doner Kebab is widely known as a popular street food, easily accessible and quick to serve.
Turkish Cuisine
: The culinary tradition where Doner Kebab has its roots, reflecting rich and diverse flavors.
Great location in South Miami Beach
Menu
Appetizers
Hummus with Pita Bread
$8.99
Enjoy a delightful blend of mashed chickpeas mixed with tahini, garlic, salt, paprika, cumin, freshly squeezed lemon, and olive oil, weighing 200 grams, served with artisanal pita bread.
Falafel Appetizer
$8.99
A deep-fried, patty-shaped fritter crafted from ground chickpeas, cilantro, parsley, cumin, onion, garlic, salt, and breadcrumbs, served with crisp lettuce, fresh tomato, and a flavorful garlic sauce. This dish is a delightful blend of herbs and spices, perfect for a savory treat.
Içli Köfte (Kibbeh)
$3.75 e/ piece

Doner Kebab Plate Veggie.

Lahmacun
is a Turkish flatbread topped with minced meat, minced vegetables, herbs and spices.

Lahmacun
is a Turkish flatbread topped with minced meat, minced vegetables, herbs and spices. It is complimented by fresh lettuce, red cabbage, Sumac salad, Carrot, and slice of lime.

black tea that is served hot and usually unsweetened

RESERVATIONS
MEDITERRANEAN BLISS
ADRIFT Mare is a Mediterranean restaurant and cocktail bar curated by Michelin-starred ‘Gypsy Chef™’ David Myers at the sophisticated urban retreat Hotel AKA Brickell in Miami. Perched on the 25th floor, offering stunning views of Biscayne Bay,
Enjoy our terrace or private dining for a memorable experience, perfect for any occasion. Experience unparalleled cuisine, panoramic views and an unmatched ambience at ADRIFT Mare
ADRIFT Mare brings together the elegance of the French Riviera, the laid back vibe of the Balearic islands, the vibrancy of fresh Italian produce, warm Levant hospitality and the gentle rhythm of the Greek isles.
BOOK NOW
DRINK
ADRIFT Mare’s cocktail list is designed by internationally acclaimed bartenders, Moe Aljaff and Juliette Larrouy whose collective legacy spans top-ranking bars Himkok, Le Syndicat and Two Schmucks. Expect Mediterranean ingredients, elegant and minimalist aesthetics, and defined, bold flavors.
Our wine list showcases the best terroirs in and around the Mediterranean Sea, from Ancient World labels from Greece to Super Tuscans and Provençal rosés.
EAT
Our menu is composed with warm summer evenings on the seaside at heart. Grilled meats, fish and crustacean feature alongside light pastas and thoughtfully prepared vegetable dishes.
Expect Gypsy Chef™ fan-favorites reinvented through the lens of ADRIFT Mare alongside original dishes inspired by the culture, cuisine and ingredients of the Mediterranean sea.
MENU
BREAKFAST
DINNER
SWEET DREAMS
DRINKS
WINE
HAPPY HOUR
MIAMI SPICE
PRIVATE EVENTS
:
Host Your Event with a View at ADRIFT Mare
Whether you're planning an intimate gathering or a grand celebration, ADRIFT Mare offers the perfect setting with breathtaking ocean views and versatile spaces to suit your needs.
Step into
The Bay Room
,
our exclusive private dining space, where up to 45 guests can enjoy a seated experience or 60 for a lively reception—all while taking in the stunning seascape.
For larger events, our main dining room can accommodate parties of up to 20 guests, while a full restaurant buyout offers ample space for 85 seated guests or a reception for up to 200.
Let us bring your vision to life—
contact our events team
to discuss your requirements and create an unforgettable experience.
events@miami.adriftmare.com
(305) 503-6529

Main Menu

Our catering option
A variety of
Delicious options
Shawarma chicken sandwich
Beef shawarma platter
Mix shawarma family platter
For parties of 4 to 12 people
Family platters
All our platters come garnished with; rice, POTATO'S, cabbage salad, fattouch salad, sauce & bread
Mix shawarma family platter
Our classic meat shawarma and chicken shawarma. Served with rice, potatoes, salad, hummus, garlic sauce, and four pitas. Expect 30 minutes grill time.
$79.99
Mixed skewer family platter
Three filet mignon skewers (cooked medium rare, unless specified otherwise), three chicken skewers, three kafta skewers, rice, potatoes, salad, hummus, garlic sauce, and four pitas. Exceptionally for this item. Expect 30 minutes grill time.
$79.99
Falafel family platter
Comes with 12 fresh Falafel, Rice, Garlic Potatoes, Salad, 4 Bread, 2 Hummus & 2 Tahini
$54.99
Grilled whole chicken family plater
Whole grilled chicken, with potatoes, rice, salad, garlic sauce, and four pitas. Exceptionally for this item, please allow 35 minutes grilling time for whole chicken. Great things take time 😉
$54.99
Catering flyer
Order catering a la carte
Mix and match different sides, main dishes, appetizers...
Delicious
Sweets & Desserts
kunefe tray (12 pcs)
Kunefe is a traditional Middle Eastern dessert made with semolina dough, soaked in homemade sugar-based syrup, and layered with cheese & pistachio. The Syrup Is Set on The side. Therefore you control the amount of Sweetness you want 🙂
Namoura tray (Lebanese sponge cake)
Semolina based sponge cake covered with our homemade Lebanese syrup.
Maamool (12pcs) (Stuffed samolina cookie)
Semolina cookie stuffed with pistachio, walnut or dates. Possible to mix and match.
Birds nest backlava (12pcs)
Finely shredded phyllo dough, filled with pistachios and baked to a golden brown color then soaked in our delicious homemade syrup.
Mix of baklava (12pcs)
A mix of various baklava, ballourie, birds nest, cashew backlava, walnut baklava and much more.
Ballourie baklava (12pcs)
2 layers of fine shredded dough stuffed with pistachio drenched in our home made syrup.
Halava mix (4lb)
Halva is a traditional Middle Eastern fudge-like confection made with tahini (sesame seed paste), sugar, spices and nuts. Various flavors available.
Whole tray of backlava triangle (16pcs)
Pistachio baklava imported from turkey.
Coconut cookie (12pcs)
Coconut based cookie. Fluffy on the inside with a great crunch to it.

About the Business
Located in the heart of Brickell, Miami, CLAUDIE is a French restaurant that embodies the elegance of the South of France. Inspired by "la cuisine du soleil" by Roger Vergé, our menu showcases vibrant Mediterranean flavors with a modern bistronomy touch.

Enjoy a curated wine and cocktail selection paired with five-star service and warm hospitality, every moment here is designed to delight. Experience French dining at its finest. Whether you're dining with us or planning your next private event, our refined yet inviting space offers the perfect setting for any occasion.

Authentic Mediterranean Food in Miami, FL | Rice Kitchen
top of page
MENU
REWARDS
MISSION
LOCATIONS
More...
Use tab to navigate through the menu items.
CATERING
ORDER NOW
​
Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, shellfish, eggs, or pasteurized milk may increase your risk of food borne illness. Our stores offers products with tree nuts, milk, eggs, and wheat. While we take steps to minimize the risk of cross contamination, we can not guarantee that any of our products are safe to consume for people with these allergies.
When it comes to authentic Mediterranean food, there are few things that are as satisfying as the bold flavors and fresh ingredients that come together to create this one-of-a-kind cuisine. As a company that is dedicated to bringing the best of this rich and diverse culinary world to Miami, FL, Rice Kitchen understands the importance of authenticity in every dish we serve.
​
From the tangy, bright flavors of fresh herbs and citrus to the rich, savory notes of olive oil and garlic, authentic Mediterranean cuisine is all about celebrating the natural flavors of the ingredients we use. Whether it's a juicy chicken skewer, a crisp and tangy Greek salad, or a creamy, rich hummus spread, each dish is bursting with flavor and crafted with care to highlight the unique tastes and traditions of the region.
​
At Rice Kitchen, we take pride in sourcing only the freshest and highest-quality ingredients for every dish we serve. Our chefs are passionate about bringing the best of the Mediterranean to our customers, taking inspiration from the diverse culinary traditions of Iran (Persian) and beyond to create dishes that are both delicious and authentic.
​
Whether you're in the mood for a hearty and filling meal or a light and refreshing snack, our menu has something for everyone. Discover the rich and vibrant flavors of this incredible cuisine at
Rice Kitchen
today.
Our Mediterranean Cuisine

About Us

Daily Bread is a family-owned and operated Middle Eastern restaurant and marketplace located in the Pinecrest neighborhood of Miami. Since 1978, Daily Bread has been a favorite among local residents and tourists alike, offering the most authentic Middle Eastern cuisine and selection of gourmet products in South Florida.

About the Business
What Makes Zaytona Grill Special

At Zaytona Grill, we bring authentic Mediterranean flavors to Kendall with dishes made fresh daily. From shawarma, falafel, hummus, and grape leaves to hearty sandwiches and family meals, there’s something for everyone. We’re known for our warm hospitality and fast, convenient service—perfect for dine-in, pickup, or delivery. Guests also love our Arabic sweets like baklava and specialty cakes, plus our small Mediterranean market that makes the experience unique. At Zaytona, friendly staff welcome you like family, so you always feel at home.

About

Breakfast
Lunch
Dinner
Testimonials
Gallery
Contact
Breakfast
Breakfast by Turkuaz Turkish Cuisine
At Turkuaz Turkish Cuisine, we invite you to start your day with a delightful journey through the flavors of the Mediterranean at our breakfast restaurant. Our menu boasts a tantalizing selection of dishes that blend the best Turkish, Greek food, and Mediterranean food, ensuring a breakfast experience like no other. Indulge in our halal-certified offerings, knowing that every bite is prepared with care and respect for dietary preferences. From fluffy omelets filled with fresh vegetables and savory cheeses to golden-brown pastries bursting with aromatic herbs and spices, each dish celebrates culinary craftsmanship. Whether you prefer a traditional Turkish breakfast spread featuring olives, feta cheese, and freshly baked bread or crave the bold flavors of Greek yogurt topped with honey and nuts, our breakfast menu satisfies every palate. Join us at Turkuaz Turkish Cuisine and awaken your senses with a morning feast that transports you to the sun-kissed shores of the Mediterranean.

Sushi Bar in Miami Beach, FL
Miami Beach, FL, possesses something that's hard to find — a restaurant that serves sushi and rustic Italian cuisine under one roof.
Welcome To
17 Restaurant and Sushi Bar
17 Restaurant and Sushi Bar is your go-to spot for flavorful pizzas and delectable sushi specials. Established more than ten years ago and right in the heart of Miami Beach, 17 Restaurant and Sushi Bar is committed to quality food. Here, you will find high-end kosher-friendly dishes to enjoy year-round. Supervised to the foremost kashrut standards, we offer a host of styles and flavors. We use the freshest organic ingredients and are committed to excellent service.

Mykonos Kitchen & Bar brings the authentic taste of Greece to Sunny Isles Beach, FL. Our waterfront restaurant offers a vibrant dining experience with a menu crafted from fresh ingredients and traditional recipes. From savory appetizers to signature cocktails, we provide exceptional food quality and warm hospitality. Whether it's a romantic dinner, family brunch, or special event, we create memorable moments for every occasion.

Customer Feedback
what our happy customers say about us
If you want to try real Greek food with a great taste, good prices and very good service, this is the place to go. Their Pastitsio is soooo good that is the top in Miami and compared to the one I had in a greek island, it is the second. And for desserts, they bake a Galactobourico that is simply out of this world, to a point than when I order it I tell my family to get their own ones, because I do not share.
Hector
Went there with a few buddies, this was the best Greek Food I’ve ever had. We had the lambshank, village salad, satziki with gyro meat, and Greek fries. The pita bread nice perfectly warmed with olive oil and lemon flavor. Most pita bread ive ever had is pan fried, not here, it had beautiful grill marks.
Then we had their famous Pagoto (icecream) over shreaded wheat, called birds nest. The best warm and cold icecream experience.
Jet
The service, cleanness, food all are second to none. This is a home made Greek food tastes if YA YA made it fresh!!!
The ingredients are and taste so fresh and good quality. The service is very friendly and prompt. Prices are a bit high, but the location is Coral Gables and quality is superb, so I am willing to pay a bit more for freshness and taste. The grilled octopus appetizer is the best I have had in America. Stuffed cabbage was just amazingly seasoned and prepared.
Madmax

About the Business
Poseidon Greek Restaurant & Outdoor Lounge has made his new home in South Beach and now hungry diners who crave the fabulous flavors of Greek, Mediterranean and seafood cuisine can check out this new eatery. At Poseidon, the chefs follow Hippocrates recommendation that "food be thy medicine", by crafting healthy dishes rather than making popsicles from cough syrup. They sprinkle their recipes with krocus kozanis, a golden Greek spice, and infuses meals with oregano, rosemary, and thyme culled from the Taygetos Mountain of Kalamata. They also import fresh fish from the Aegean Sea before brushing salmon with extra virgin olive oil and tossing pasta with a medley of shellfish. Slick white tables and cool blue walls recall a refreshing day spent among the blue and white abodes lining the Greek shores of the Mediterranean.
Prepare yourselves for a culinary journey to Greece through this wonderful experience and taste. Plus, with one of the best outdoor dining!

name: Meet Dalia
raw_text:
About - Meet Dalia Miami
Skip to content
Reserve
Reserve
Situated on the iconic Ocean Drive in Miami Beach, Meet Dalia offers an Internationally-inspired menu with both indoor and sidewalk seating.
About
Dalia brings together the finest ingredients from around the world, for an innovative take on Mediterranean cuisine.
Upon arrival, you’ll be transported into a cultural sanctuary that blends design, comfort and impeccable food.
Our vibrant lunchtimes make way to lively evenings as soon as the sun sets. The breezy, seaside-inspired design is bursting with color and patterns making it a reflection of the sun-kissed energy of Miami Beach.
Uplift your senses at Dalia. After all, life happens at the table

KEBABS
PINCHO BURGER
Topped with American cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, onions, potato sticks and our secret PINCHO sauce.
CLASSIC CHICKEN
100% fresh chicken breast topped with lettuce, tomatoes, onions, American cheese, potato sticks, and PINCHO sauce.
STEAK KEBAB
100% fresh premium steak seasoned and grilled to perfection.
KETO SALAD
Fresh spring mix tossed in our Ranch dressing and topped with tomatoes, cucumbers, queso frito and your choice of protein.
PINCHO BURGER
Topped with American cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, onions, potato sticks and our secret PINCHO sauce.
PERFECTO BURGER
Topped with Provolone cheese, caramelized onions, potato sticks and our cilantro sauce.
PIPO'S CHOICE
Topped with smoked gouda, sweet maduro bits, applewood-smoked bacon, grilled onions, potato sticks, and our guava ketchup.
TOSTON BURGER
Topped with 2 fried plantains as the "buns," topped with provolone cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, and our cilantro sauce.
VEGGIE BURGER
Topped with American cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, onions, potato sticks, and our secret PINCHO sauce.
CHEESEBURGER
Topped with American cheese, served in a buttery, toasted brioche bun.
BACON CHEESEBURGER
Topped with American cheese, applewood smoked bacon, and our secret Pincho sauce.
BACON ME GOUDA CHEESEBURGER
Topped with Smoked Gouda cheese, caramelized onions, chopped applewood-smoked bacon, Buttermilk Ranch and Chipotle Sauce all served in a buttery-toasted Brioche Bun.
CLASSIC CHICKEN
100% fresh chicken breast topped with lettuce, tomatoes, onions, American cheese, potato sticks, and PINCHO sauce.
TOSTON CHICKEN
100% fresh chicken breast topped with Provolone cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, and cilantro sauce between two fried plantains as buns.
PINCHO PLATE - BUILD YOUR OWN
You can now build your own PINCHO plate, simply select your protein and any two sides.
VACA FRITA PLATE (BRAISED BEEF)
100 percent braised beef. Served with any 2 sides plus pita bread and a sauce of your choice.
STEAK PLATE
100% fresh steak, served with any 2 sides plus pita bread and a sauce of your choice.
CHICKEN KEBAB PLATE
100 percent fresh chicken. Served with any 2 sides plus pita bread and a sauce of your choice.
SHRIMP KEBAB PLATE
100 percent fresh shrimp. Served with any 2 sides plus pita bread and a sauce of your choice.
NEW LATIN BOWL
Fresh tomato mix, black beans, and sweet plantain bits, served over a bed of rice and drizzled with our signature cilantro sauce.
TEX MEX BOWL
Fresh tomato mix, flame roasted corn, black beans, and chopped pineapple, drizzled with chipotle aioli.
VACA FRITA BOWL
Our 16-hour braised beef, fresh tomato salsa, black beans, and maduro bits, served over a bed of rice and drizzled with our signature cilantro sauce.
KETO SALAD

Salads
Tabouli
Tabbouleh recipe features loads of
fresh parsley, mint, lemon, and bulgur wheat
. It’s a delicious take on the Middle Eastern herb salad.
$10
Lebanese Salad
A fresh and simple mix of diced tomatoes, cucumbers, parsley, onions, and mint, tossed in a light lemon and olive oil dressing. Crisp, healthy, and full of bright Mediterranean flavors—perfect as a starter or side dish.
$10
Fatoush
A refreshing Lebanese salad made with crisp romaine lettuce, juicy tomatoes, cucumbers, radishes, and fresh herbs, all tossed in a zesty sumac-lemon dressing. Topped with crunchy, toasted pita chips for the perfect balance of flavor and texture. Light, healthy, and full of Mediterranean goodness!
$10
Cold Mezza
Muhamara Dip
A rich and smoky blend of roasted red peppers, walnuts, olive oil, and a touch of pomegranate molasses, seasoned with warm spices for a sweet, tangy, and slightly spicy kick. Served with pita bread, this vibrant dip is a true taste of the Mediterranean.
$12
Mix Mezza Dip
Choice of 3 dips (Hummus, Baba Ghanoush, Muhamara, Labne)
$15
Labne Dip
Creamy, tangy, and ultra-smooth strained yogurt drizzled with extra virgin olive oil and sprinkled with za’atar. Served with warm pita bread, it’s a light and refreshing dip that’s perfect as a starter or side to any meal.
$10
Hummus Dip
A silky blend of chickpeas, tahini, fresh lemon juice, and garlic, whipped to creamy perfection and drizzled with extra virgin olive oil. Served with warm pita bread, this timeless Mediterranean favorite is smooth, flavorful, and naturally vegan.
$10
Garlic Cream
A rich, fluffy, and velvety garlic sauce made with fresh garlic, lemon juice, and oil, whipped to perfection. Bursting with bold flavor, it’s the perfect dip or spread to elevate grilled meats, sandwiches, or veggies.
$10
Baba Ghanoush Dip
A smoky, creamy blend of fire-roasted eggplant, tahini, fresh lemon juice, and garlic, topped with a drizzle of olive oil. Served with pita bread, this classic dip is packed with rich, earthy flavors and makes the perfect starter or side.
$10
Hot Mezza
Hummus with Beef Shawarma
Creamy, smooth, and rich in flavor—our classic
hummus
is made from perfectly blended
chickpeas
,
tahini
,
lemon
, and
garlic
, creating the ideal base for one of our signature toppings: tender, marinated
beef shawarma
. Slow-cooked with aromatic spices and seared to perfection, the beef adds a savory, melt-in-your-mouth finish to this beloved dish.
S
$17
Hummus with Chicken Shawarma
Creamy, smooth hummus topped with a flavorful mix of tender, marinated beef and chicken shawarma. Finished with a drizzle of olive oil and a sprinkle of spices, served with warm pita bread. A hearty and delicious combination of classic flavors in every bite!
$17
Hummus with Mix Shawarma
$17

Bulgur kibbeh stuffed with ground beef, pine nuts, home spice
$12
Vegetarian  Kibbeh

$14

6 pcs  of  popular Latin favorite! Tequenos de Queso,  Crispy, golden pastry sticks filled with warm, melted cheese and fried to perfection. Served with a side of dipping sauce for the ultimate cheesy snack—perfect to share or enjoy all to yourself.
$10

ground chickpeas
,
fresh herbs
, cilantro,
garlic
, and lebanese
spices
, each bite delivers a perfect balance of texture and taste.
$10

$12
Meat Grape Leaves
Tender grape leaves stuffed with a savory blend of seasoned ground beef, rice, fresh herbs, and spices. Slowly cooked to perfection, a timeless Mediterranean favorite that’s rich in flavor and tradition.
$10

hummus
,

, and

fried kibbeh
. Fresh pita bread and pickles on the side make this an ideal starter to share or enjoy as a light meal.

hero gallery paused, press to play images slides
Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides
Food & Drinks with A View
ASTRA is a place for sipping crafted cocktails and drinking in the incomparable city view. Our house mixologist can whisk up a designer cocktail while you lay back and relax on plump cushions in a pure setting with teak wood accents and lush landscapes.
Complete with alfresco dining, the sky-high space lends itself as a year-round experience in the heart of the most colorful artistic neighborhood, Wynwood. ASTRA serves exquisite dishes using the freshest produce and is presented with style in this panoramic setting.
