Food Menu
Appetizers
Hummus & Bread
Creamy chickpea dip served with warm bread
Muhammara & Bread
Roasted red pepper and walnut spread with bread.
Tzatziki & Bread
Traditional yogurt and cucumber dip served with bread.
Honey Chili Fries
Crispy fries tossed in honey and chili.
Fries & Cheese
Golden fries topped with melted cheese.
Truffle Fries
Crispy fries drizzled with truffle oil.
Calamari
Fried crispy calamari served with marinara sauce.
Lentil Soup
Traditional Turkish lentil soup with croutons and lemon.
Wings
Choice of Buffalo Hot, Lemon & Pepper, BBQ, or Honey & Chili.
Sauté Mussels
Local mussels sautéed in wine and red sauce.
Frito Misto
A platter of mozzarella sticks, wings, and french fries
Tacos
Choose beef, chicken, or shrimp.
Pizzas
S47 Special
Signature sauce, basil, chicken, steak, mushrooms, peppers, olives, tomatoes, and cheese.
Steak Pizza
Savory steak with mushrooms, peppers, olives, tomatoes, and cheese.
Chicken Pizza
Tender chicken with fresh vegetables and melted cheese.
Philly Steak Pizza
White sauce base with Philly-style steak, onions, peppers, mushrooms, and mozzarella.
BBQ Chicken Pizza
BBQ sauce base, grilled chicken, red onions, mozzarella, and cilantro.
Deluxe Pizza
Mushrooms, peppers, olives, tomatoes, and basil over mozzarella.
Cheese Pizza
Classic tomato sauce and melted mozzarella.
Vegetarian Pizza
Eggplant, mushrooms, peppers, olives, tomatoes, basil, and mozzarella.
Pepperoni Pizza
Tomato sauce, halal pepperoni, and mozzarella.
Margherita Pizza
Tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, basil leaves, and an olive oil drizzle.
Salads
Greek Salad
Tomatoes, cucumbers, peppers, onions, feta cheese, and extra virgin olive oil.
Caesar Salad
Fresh lettuce, crunchy croutons, and creamy Caesar dressing.
Burgers
American Classic
Angus beef patty with American cheese, lettuce, tomato, pickles, red onion, and secret sauce.
Bacon Cheeseburger
Angus beef patty topped with crispy bacon and cheese.
S47 Deluxe
Angus beef patty with egg, cheddar, diced red onion, and secret mayo.
Sandwiches & Wraps
Philly Cheese Steak
Strips of beef and melted cheddar on a toasted roll.
The Perfect Chicken
Breaded chicken breast with bacon, lettuce, onion, tomato, and cheddar.
Cheddar Ranch Chicken
Breaded chicken with lettuce, pickles, tomato, onion, and cheddar.
Grilled Chicken Sandwich
Seasoned grilled chicken breast with lettuce, pickles, tomato, onion, and cheddar.
Chicken Wrap
Chargrilled chicken with lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickles in a tortilla.
Caesar Chicken Wrap
Chargrilled chicken with lettuce, parmesan, and Caesar dressing.
Mains
Chicken Shish Kebab
Chargrilled chicken thighs with herbs and spices served over handmade lavash.
Lamb Chops
Grass-fed lamb chops grilled and served with broccoli and rice.
Alfredo Chicken Pasta
Fettuccine tossed in creamy Alfredo sauce with chicken.
Grilled Salmon
Atlantic salmon with mashed potatoes, asparagus, and lemon butter sauce.
Bolognese Pasta
Penne rigate with traditional meat sauce, parmesan, oregano, and EVOO.
Parmesan Chicken
Breaded chicken over penne in white sauce, topped with crushed tomatoes, provolone, mozzarella, and parmesan.
Desserts
Cheesecake
New York-style cheesecake with strawberry sauce and whipped cream.
Key Lime Pie
Classic Florida pie with graham cracker crust and whipped cream.
Tiramisu
Espresso-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone, dusted with cocoa.
Churros Cinnamon Stick
Crispy churros filled with chocolate and dusted with cinnamon sugar.
Pistachio & Ricotta Cake
Sponge cake layered with ricotta and pistachio filling, topped with crunchy pistachios.

name: The Plantisserie - Plant Based Organic Deli & Market
raw_text:
The Plantisserie – Plant-based Organic Deli & Market
About
Menu
Catering
Gallery
Contact Us
Order Now
About
Menu
Catering
Gallery
Contact Us
Order Now
Organic, vegan
homestyle food.
the plantisserie
ORDER NOW
The Plantisserie
Plant-based Organic Deli & Market
Since 2015 and through our sister company, Artichoke Foods, we distribute frozen artisanal and organic vegan meals and products to our clients, developing the wholesale market around South Florida.
With the support of our customers, partners, community friends and family, we are making our dream come true by opening our first store front to the public where we now offer nutritious, organic and fresh plant based food by the pound. All our ingredients are free from pesticides, GMO’s, chemicals, hormones, preservatives, colorants, or additives.
We prepare our food as nature provides it. Maintaining its natural virtues and nutrients, free of refinements and genetic treatments, respecting in this way the intelligence of Mother Nature.
From the soil to the store, all stages are taken care of and controlled by trained personnel, paying attention to every single detail in the process.
Come and visit us at our new location where you will find not only fresh food but delicious and healthy products and snacks featuring local artisans.
LOCATION
7316 NE 2ND AVE
Little River
Miami, Fl 33138
Best Vegan Restaurant in Miami
Community choice: 2022, 2023 & 2025
We’re honored to be recognized once again by our amazing community. This year, we were voted
“Best Vegan Restaurant in Miami”
for the third time and, for the first time,
“Best Healthy Restaurant in Miami.”
These awards belong to all of you — your trust, love, and support make everything possible. Our mission remains the same: to create conscious, healthy food with passion and responsibility, honoring our bodies, our health, and Mother Earth.
Thank you for growing with us. Forever grateful.
With love,
María, Luciano & our wonderful team
Plant-based and Organic
They say preparation is one of the most important steps for making a delicious dish, and it’s true, but preparation is nothing without quality ingredients, that’s why we choose to support local organic suppliers, this way we make sure we get fresh, nutritious and flavorous products. If you cook with love and passion plus the possibility of having high-quality products just around the corner, you get the perfect combo for making something spectacular.
Cook consciously and most of all cook with love!
Our Menu
We prepare our food as nature provides it. Maintaining its natural virtues and nutrients, free of refinements and genetic treatments, respecting in this way the intelligence of Mother Nature.All our ingredients are Organics

About the Business
Wyn Wyn is local and fresh! We are taking full advantage of Florida's plethora of native produce. Wyn Wyn aims to think globally and act locally.

The menu boasts global eats with playful nods to Peru, Western Europe, Southeast Asia, Polynesia and Classic Americana. With a mission to highlighting clean eating, the menu offers several vegan, vegetable focused and gluten free options. Highlights include a beet tartare with mango 'yolk' and Chk Chk Boom, a Korean fried chicken dish with a twist.

See more testimonials
Our promise to you
30-day money back guarantee
HugeDomains provides a 100% satisfaction guarantee on every domain name that we sell through our website. If you buy a domain and are unhappy with it, we will accept the return within 30 days and issue a full refund – no questions asked.
Quick delivery of the domain
In most cases access to the domain will be available within one to two hours of purchase, however access to domains purchased after business hours will be available within the next business day.
Safe and secure shopping
Your online safety and security is our top priority. We understand the importance of protecting your personal information.
We protect your information through SSL encryption technology, providing the safest, most secure shopping experience possible. Additionally, you may checkout with PayPal or Escrow.com.
FAQs
See more FAQs
How do I transfer to another registrar such as GoDaddy?
Yes, you can transfer your domain to any registrar or hosting company once you have purchased it. Since domain transfers are a manual process, it can take up to 5 days to transfer the domain.
Domains purchased with payment plans are not eligible to transfer until all payments have been made. Please remember that our 30-day money back guarantee is void once a domain has been transferred.
For transfer instructions to GoDaddy, please
click here
.
How do I get the domain after the purchase?
Once you purchase the domain we will push it into an account for you at our registrar, NameBright.com, we will then send you an email with your NameBright username and password. In most cases access to the domain will be available within one to two hours of purchase, however access to domains purchased after business hours will be available within the next business day.
What comes with the domain name?
Nothing else is included with the purchase of the domain name. Our registrar NameBright.com does offer email packages for a yearly fee, however you will need to find hosting and web design services on your own.
Do you offer payment plans?
Yes we offer payment plans for up to 12 months.
See details
.
How do I keep my personal information private?
If you wish the domain ownership information to be private, add WhoIs Privacy Protection to your domain. This hides your personal information from the general public.
To add privacy protection to your domain, do so within your registrar account. NameBright offers WhoIs Privacy Protection for free for the first year, and then for a small fee for subsequent years.
Whois information is not updated immediately. It typically takes several hours for Whois data to update, and different registrars are faster than others. Usually your Whois information will be fully updated within two days.
See more FAQs

ORDER
Made by chefs, served with hustle.
THE SUMMER MENU
The future of food is here.
We're a farm-to-table
New American restaurant
serving seasonal, locally-sourced food from farms close to home. It's simple: our food is sourced from farmers and partners we know on a first-name basis, brought in from the fields, and cooked by chefs who know their vegetables.
Our healthy dining options are unique and flavorful, changing with the seasons for optimal quality and ultimate taste. Check out our
catering
menu today, or order your food for dine-in,
pick-up
or
delivery
today.
Seasonal Highlights
Chef curated pairings to showcase our favorite seasonal ingredients.
NEW!
– Golden Beet & Burrata Salad
Fresh Local Burrata, Golden Beets, Summer Tomatoes, Baby Arugula, Farm Greens with Mint, Pickled Onion, Pistachio Streusal, Basil Pesto (un)dressing.
Contains dairy, wheat, soy, & tree nuts:pistachio.
NEW!
– Summer BBQ Chicken Salad
Roasted BBQ Chicken Breast, Shaved Cabbage, Tuscan Kale, Charred Corn, Tomatoes, Cucumbers, Radishes, Cilantro, Cotija Cheese, Half Avocado, Cilantro Lime Vinaigrette.
Contains dairy & soy.

Flora Plant Kitchen | Plant Powered Restaurant in Miami, FL
hero video paused, press to play video
Playing hero video, press to pause video
Plant powered food with a Latin twist in Morningside, Miami
Experience good eats with a greater purpose
Flora Plant Kitchen is here to take you on a culinary journey of healthy Latin-inspired cuisine. Our restaurant, carefully stylized in Morningside and inspired by nature, will bring your taste buds alive with delicious plant powered food, refreshing beverage options and sustainable living practices.
Our Spaces
Plant-Based Dining Miami
Welcome to Flora Plant Kitchen, where the vibrant spirit of Miami meets the wholesome goodness of plant-based dining. Nestled in the heart of Morningside, our unique restaurant seamlessly fuses Latin flavors with a dedication to healthy, fresh ingredients. At Flora Plant Kitchen, we invite you to experience a casual indoor or outdoor dining atmosphere that embraces sustainability and nature-inspired design.
Our carefully stylized space reflects our commitment to creating an environment that mirrors the natural beauty of our planet. As Miami's newest plant-based destination, we take pride in offering a diverse menu crafted from the freshest ingredients, ensuring every bite is a celebration of flavor and well-being.
Indulge in our refreshing beverage options that perfectly complement our Latin-inspired vegetarian cuisine. At Flora Plant Kitchen, we believe in the power of plant-based meals to make a positive impact not only on your health but also on the health of our planet. Join us in our mission to promote a sustainable future one delicious meal at a time.
Outdoor Dining Restaurant Miami
We welcome everyone to embrace a lifestyle of inclusivity and health, with no dress code to hinder the joy of savoring our delicious offerings. At Flora Plant Kitchen, we celebrate the choice to incorporate plant-based meals into your routine, making a difference for both your well-being and the planet's health.
Discover a culinary journey that transcends the ordinary at Flora Plant Kitchen – where Miami's vibrant energy meets the goodness of sustainable, plant-based living.
The Design
Founder & Creative Director: Marnie Gelhard
Marnie Gelhard is a talented brand designer known for her global perspective and love for nature. Originally from Sydney, Australia, she grew up in Singapore and New York. Marnie has a deep passion for creating amazing restaurant concepts, particularly for seamlessly blending indoor and outdoor dining spaces.
As a female entrepreneur, Marnie embodies the spirit of a dedicated "girl boss," demonstrating unwavering determination and a tireless work ethic. Her journey with Flora, which began with hand-drawing a logo in 2019, has evolved into overseeing all aspects of design, including graphic design, interior design, social media, packaging, web, and branding. Studying at Santa Clara University and Shillington College provided Marnie with a solid foundation and a well-rounded approach to design. Her innovative touch and meticulous attention to detail sets a new standard for restaurant design, leaving an indelible mark on the industry.

HOW TO GET TO MIA MARKET
Reaching MIA Market is convenient and easy, thanks to its central location. Located in the heart of the Miami Design District, it is a popular Food Hall destination for locals and tourists alike. Below are several transportation options to help you find your way to MIA Market:
By Car:
If you prefer to drive, MIA Market offers ample parking facilities for its customers. You can input the address into your GPS or navigation system, and it will guide you directly to the market.
BEST PARKING
Palm Court Garage
NEAREST VALET
Valet Station 2 (V2)
By  Walking:
For those who enjoy a more active approach, walking can be a great option. The market is centrally located, making it easily accessible from various parts of the city. Just plot your route towards the
Palm Court Garage
and you'll find MIA Market on the second floor.
By Ride-Sharing Services:
Ride-sharing services are widely available in the city, offering a convenient way to reach MIA Market without worrying about parking or navigating public transportation. Simply open your preferred ride-sharing app, enter MIA Market as your destination, and wait for your driver to pick you up.
Follow Us On
Social
MIA Market is A Diverse
Food Hall With
a
Vibrant, Welcoming Atmosphere
Dining Experience at MIA Market
Located in Miami's Design District on the second floor, MIA Market offers a vibrant dining experience. Surrounded by trendy shops and upscale dining options, our spacious setting provides the perfect backdrop for exploring a range of premium food choices in a welcoming space filled with natural light and modern decor. Whether you're in the mood for international cuisine or local favorites, MIA Market boasts a wide selection of high-quality food—from gourmet sandwiches to fresh sushi—that caters to all tastes. Conveniently situated in the heart of Miami's Design District, MIA Market invites you to savor a memorable dining experience that showcases the city's lively food scene.

MENUS
Patrícia Dobrovodská
21:23 27 Nov 24
Amazing new wines!
James Graham
17:30 26 Nov 24
Christian was very friendly and took his time explaining each wine.
Michael Lordi
20:52 25 Nov 24
Iriana Quiles Zuhei Coach
01:57 25 Nov 24
Spend my birthday celebration here
The Apretivo was Pork Belly in Cilantro sauce and Dinner was Lamb with Potatoes and Tostones.
Also Take Sangria Carbenet
Taste several Wines and buy some Bottles to Take At the Wine Bar, our Bartebder Jessy, a super attentive and friendly boy, I loved everything he explained to us about each of the Wines
shae benjamin
23:23 17 Nov 24
The ambiance was amazing! Our waiter Ernesto was very informative and attentive.
There's so much to see and learn about Schnebly Redland's Winery please make time to visit! Take a look at my meal which was super delish!!! I must say compliments to the chef!!! Thank you Schnebly!
Alejandra Rivera
18:56 06 Nov 24
Visited with some friends and loved the environment. The day was clear and windy making it a great experience. We shared a bottle of the Category 3 Hurricane and it was  really good. We did not have time to try the brewery but I think it's a great excuse to go back. There are multiple wine options including wine tasting. It's a great place to spend an evening with friends or family. Totally recommend and I'm hoping to go back soon.
Rene Figueroa
20:26 26 Oct 24
This is a place that you must visit when you’re in the Homestead area! Place is beautifully decorated and well thought out. They have a a lovely outdoor area where kids can run around and play while adults admire the exotic fish in the pond.
The food and service are top notch! I had never tried any tropical fruit wine before until I came to this place! Mia, our server, is extremely knowledgeable in the menu and offered us some suggestions! I had the burger and the meat was cooked to the temperature I requested and presentation was nice! We also had the tuna salad, which was very refreshing!
Tip: They also serve coffee! We had an expresso, latte and mocha!
felipe
18:39 12 Oct 24
If you’re looking for a great experience at Schnebly Redlands Winery, ask for Layla as your waitress. Layla is attentive, friendly, and has excellent knowledge of the menu, both in terms of food and wine. She goes out of her way to ensure that your dining experience is comfortable and enjoyable. Whether you’re a regular or visiting for the first time, she makes sure you’re well taken care of. Layla is quick to recommend the perfect wine pairings and provides prompt service without being overbearing. Her welcoming attitude adds a personal touch to the overall ambiance of Schnebly’s. Highly recommended!

Plnthouse Café
Back
Back
Plnthouse Café
About
Menu
[email protected]
305.604.1000
Plnthouse is home to 1 Hotel South Beach's healthiest dishes and offers locally sourced organic fare for any dietary preference.
Whether you are grabbing a bite to go, dining pool-side or relaxing with us on our terrace, Plnthouse is the perfect South Beach escape.
Located on the 2nd floor.
Plnthouse is open exclusively to hotel guests.
HOURS
Daily | 8am - 5pm
Fresh, local flavors
Enjoy breakfast, lunch or a quick smoothie after the gym with an ocean view. Create your own bowl with a variety of the freshest local ingredients, or make it a custom wrap.
Soft Serve Ice Cream
Beat the heat with gluten-free vanilla and chocolate flavors. Top it off with our sweet offerings from the toppings bar.
tagline
Executive Chef
CHEF JUAN VILLA
Born and raised in Nevada and of Mexican descent, Executive Chef Juan Villa began his culinary journey at the age of 16. During his childhood, he was constantly surrounded by food, culture, and family gatherings which inspired his desire to create the same atmosphere in restaurant settings. He now brings with him a wealth of knowledge and worldly experience to 1 Hotel South Beach’s portfolio.

About the Business
At Aroma Tropical, we’re more than just a restaurant—we’re a taste of home with a twist! Carmen, took over this spot in Cutler Bay to carry on a legacy of Dominican flavors, blending her passion for cooking with the vibrant food culture of the Dominican Republic. From our famous “cinco golpes” breakfast—mangú, scrambled eggs, cheese, salami, and longaniza—to hearty sancocho that warms the soul, every dish is made with love, just like abuela’s kitchen. Located in Marlin Plaza, we’re a cozy, casual spot where the Spanish-speaking crowd and food lovers alike come to feel the island vibes. our mission to bring authentic Dominican eats to your table—whether you dine in, order online, or cater your next fiesta. Come see why we’re a Cutler Bay gem!
…

OUR SMASHed BURGERS MENU
Welcome to our famous smashed burger menu. No, it’s not an ancient king’s feast table; it’s actually way better.
Make it yours, only at Smash House Burgers.

Our Smashed Burger Restaurant Menu
Check out our burger restaurant menu for more than your favorite smash! You’ve got to try our delicious Dirty Fries, famous crunchy Popcorn Chicken, or the exciting prizes that await discovery by little hands on the kids’ menu. It’s options, options, options, made for your family by our family.
Everyone is welcome, whether you’re craving gourmet fried chicken indulgence, 100% Kosher meals, kid-approved tastes, or a cold one from the drinks menu.
Fancy a tasty bite at our place later?
FREE smashing DELIVERY!
*Up to 5 miles, on orders above $30 *Only $2.99 delivery fee over 5 miles

Belgium Waffle (1) OR French Toast (6)
The crispy, fluffy vegan and gluten free waffle is packed with flavor, Available toppings for an addtional $1.95. Choice of organic fruits; bananas, blueber-ries and sta=rawberries. Served with agave or maple syrup. 
$15.95
Pancakes (3)
Fluffy vegan pancakes. Topped with 1 fruit option. Choice of: organic blueberries, strawberries or bananas. $15.95
Avocado Toast (2 slices)
Choice of 4 toppings. Topings choices: grape tomatoes, mushrooms, arugula, spinach, chia seeds, lemon, olive oil drizzle, vegan cheese or balsamic glaze. $15.95
Omelet
Flyffy vegan 'egg' omelet. Option of 4 fillings. Fillings;organic spinach, mushrooms, vegan cheese, onions, peppers, broccoli and tomato. Choice of protein: Vegan "beef" crumbles, vegan sausage or tofu for an additional upcharge of $2.95. $15.95

name: Meat The Veggies
raw_text:
Menu – Meat the Veggies
About Us
Menu
Order Pulled Oxtail Meat
Book Magic City Experience
Contact Us
Real Meat + Real Vegetables = Meat the Veggies
We offer a wide range of services. You can place a catering order for pickup or delivery directly from our kitchen, just choose your items, pick a date and time, and get ready to enjoy!
Not seeing what you’re looking for or want us to come on site? Fill out the catering inquiry form and we’ll make sure to bring your next event to life!
Catering or other Inquiry
Famous MTV Sandwiches
The Original Pulled Oxtail Sandwich™ ½ and whole
Mouthwatering braised and pulled oxtail meat, resting upon luxurious seasoned slaw. Sandwiched between soft sweet Hawaiian bread. A hand crafted, next level delight!
MTV Vegan Wrap
Nutritious hand rolled and pan seared spinach tortilla stuffed with a mix of fluffy quinoa, hearty black beans, fresh pico de gallo, and avocado. Served with MTV house sauce.
Meat & Seafood
Cherry Citrus BBQ wings
3 or 5 whole chicken wings fried naked and crispy, garnished with scintillating spice and herbs. Served with a side of tangy, full bodied cherry citrus BBQ sauce. Hand crafted and chef inspired.
Roasted Strawberry BBQ salmon
Delicious fresh salmon filet, perfectly cooked a la plancha, coated with robust savory sweet roasted strawberry BBQ sauce. Satisfying any pescatarian’s seafood craving.
Mango herb chipotle BBQ shrimp
Tasty pan seared, herb marinated jumbo shrimp, paired with zesty mango chipotle lime BBQ sauce, for a sunny tropical feel.
Veggies & Sides
Magic mango stick
Uniquely peeled whole Miami mango, served on a sturdy handle stick with a side of agave nectar and magic spice blend.
Pink lemon pepper peas
Sautéed green peas infused with a unique tart and zesty pink lemon pepper seasoning blend. Chef’s choice, guaranteed to stimulate your taste buds!
Korean BBQ heirloom carrots
Scrumptious heirloom baby carrots, seasoned and pan seared. Leaving a lingering Korean BBQ twist. Served with a side of sweet chili sauce.
Hickory Peach porter broccolini
Flavorsome green broccolini, seasoned and sautéed in a sensational hickory peach porter blend. Seasonal. Actual product may vary.
Chimimichuri seasoned black beans
Slow simmered tangy and savory, chimichurri seasoned black beans.
Hefty herb potatoes
Heavenly herb crusted and seasoned Yukon Gold potato wedges. Accompanied by MTV special house sauce (includes vegan mayo 339 calories) for your dipping pleasure!
Veggie fried rice
Traditional, yet yummy veggie fried rice, featuring an appetizing balance of peas, and carrots. Served with or without egg.
Steamy quinoa
Fluffy steamed tri colored quinoa, perfectly cooked with a carrot, celery and onion medley. A fun and delectable rice substitute, that adds beautiful nutritional value to any meal.
White rice
Fluffy white long grain rice steamed to perfection.
Quaker grits
Comforting staple cooked to perfection.
Smokey baked macaroni and cheese
Decadent, smoked gouda cheesy baked macaroni. Served with a side of gouda cheese sauce for an indulgent addition to this popular classic.
House Salad
Iceberg lettuce, quinoa, black beans, avocado, cilantro and julienne carrots served with MTV House dressing.
Vegan plate (4 sides excluding mac & cheese)
Indulge in 4 of our tantalizing veggie/vegan options!
MTV BBQ Sauce (2 oz side)
Roasted Strawberry BBQ
Mango Chipotle BBQ
Cherry Citrus BBQ

RESERVE NOW
DORAL
OVERVIEW
DAILY SPECIALS
PRIVATE DINING
A brand-new beautiful venue awash in rustic charm, Novecento at CityPlace Doral features copper accents and natural wood finishes. An open wine cellar located on the second floor while the interior space offers diners old-world charm in an airy and bustling space. The restaurant features ample indoor and outdoor seating.
TAKE TOUR
(786) 871-4935
Hours
Lunch and Dinner:
Monday – Thursday: 11am – 11pm
Friday: 11am – 12am
Saturday: 11am- 12am
Sunday: 11am – 10pm
Weekend Brunch:
Saturday-Sunday: 11am-4pm
Happy Hour:
Monday – Sunday: 3pm – 7pm
CityPlace Doral, 3450 NW 83 Avenue, Suite 137
Cross Street
NW 36th Street
Parking Details
Free Parking at CityPlace Doral. Enjoy free parking for the first 2 hours all day Monday–Thursday and Friday before 6PM.
Staying longer or visiting on the weekend? Paid parking starts at $7.
Entertainment
Tango shows on select nights
Catering
MORE INFO
PRIVATE DINING
Plan Your Next Event
Make every party more memorable than the last with our private event spaces.
Whether celebrating a corporate function, a family milestone, a holiday gathering, rehearsal dinner or graduation, our private dining rooms offer the perfect space to eat, drink and be merry.
Let us do the work! Our team will work with you before, during and after, to ensure that every detail is done and that your event is unforgettable.

Orange Blossom Miami - Interior of restaurant
371A3952
Orange Blossom Miami - Dinner
Orange Blossom Miami - Brunch
Orange Blossom Miami - Bacon Avocado Toast
Organic healthy food
New American Restaurant
in Miami Beach
The Freshest Organic Ingredients
Welcome to
Orange Blossom
, your premier dining destination in the vibrant heart of South Beach! Nestled alongside the
Boulan Hotel
, our enchanting space invites you to experience a fusion of flavors and entertainment. Known for its commitment to
market-to-table cuisine
, the restaurant offers a rustic-chic atmosphere with both indoor and al fresco patio seating, including a delightful courtyard setting.
Orange Blossom marries traditional
Old Florida
influences with the melting pot of Miami’s
current-day international
nuances. Here, dishes are crafted with the same delicate care and attention to detail that railway passengers came to expect aboard its namesake,
The Orange Blossom Special
– the most luxurious train that connected New York to Miami in 1890.
Immerse yourself in our captivating atmosphere, complemented by bottomless mimosas during the
best brunch
in town. Serving up signature pink pancakes and a tempting array of brunch specials, indulge in a culinary journey that embraces healthy, fresh, and flavorful
New American cuisines
.
View our brunch menu
As the sun sets, Orange Blossom undergoes a magical transformation into a hub for live shows, featuring extraordinary entertainment ranging from magic performances to mesmerizing fire displays. Join us for a seamless transition from a delectable brunch to a laid-back evening filled with gourmet food, signature cocktails, and live entertainment under the stars.
Welcome to a place where each moment promises to be as unique as the city itself – Orange Blossom, where fine dining flair meets the charm of South Beach.
View our dinner menu

Welcome to a place where each moment promises to be as unique as the city itself – Orange Blossom, where fine dining flair meets the charm of South Beach.

Oceanfront Cocktails on Miami Beach
Bungalow
About Bungalow
Menus
Gallery
Contact & Hours
Welcome to our beachfront bar and restaurant located in the Cadillac Hotel & Beach Club. An oceanside palapa with direct views of the sand and sea, Bungalow serves fresh juice and small-batch coffee in the morning, and raw bar, chilled wines and light bites in the afternoon and at sunset. Our extensive selection of rosés and wines are complemented by cocktails inspired by the sea.
Reservations
OCEANFRONT COCKTAILS ON MIAMI BEACH
Bungalow offers a beachfront experience that lures locals and visitors alike with its signature raw bar, rosé selection, and ocean side atmosphere. A light ocean breeze, salt air and lulling sound of the waves complement our fresh, local seafood-inspired menu. Indulge in oysters, lobster, and crab by the half-pound, or our simply grilled catch of the day.
Embark on a Culinary Journey
There's no better setting on Miami Beach to sample light bites from our seaside raw bar or made-to-order wood-oven pizzas. Cocktails flow and the seafood is fresh and plentiful at our exclusive oceanfront hideaway.

About the Business
Authentic Cuban and Spanish dishes as well as other international flavors! We offer fresh salads with house made dressings, traditional Cuban sandwiches with imported meats and cheeses,  We offer pastas, lamb dishes, skirt steak, stuffed calamari and red snapper. Fresh, delicious and satisfying cuisine is our specialty.

For parties or business meetings, we cater delicious pastries, desserts, and finger foods for small . Our cakes are mouthwatering and beautiful. Choose from our many different styles and flavors. We are also a restaurant with a full menu with plenty to choose from.

SASHIMI
A Japanese dish consisting of thinly sliced raw fish, traditionally served with soy sauce and wasabi.

A small oval of rice topped with a thin slice of raw fish or seafood, sometimes held together by a thin band of seaweed.

Business Owner
Simple and fresh cuisine is what you will find at the cozy Village Chalet Restaurant. The Chalet is tucked in the gardens among the flowering plants and trees where you will find an unexpected pleasure in dining. The Chalet features a 1920′s bar for beer and wine and live music are held weekly on Friday & Saturday nights. Food is our passion and it reflects on our dishes.

Copper Blues Preloader Logo
Copper Blues Miami
Kitchen
The Copper Blues Kitchen is a fusion of your favorite comfort foods and elevated pub fare perfectly designed to complement the excitement and vibrancy of our live entertainment!
See Food Menu
Cocktails
Cocktails are the focus at Copper Blues combining flavors and presentation that match the energy of the room.
Our craft cocktails aren't just drinks; they're a harmonious fusion of tradition and innovation perfectly complementing the rhythm of the live music that graces our stage seven nights a week. Get ready to raise your glass to an unforgettable night where music and mixology collide in perfect harmony!
See Drink Menu
Music
Copper Blues features the best live music 7 nights a week with acoustic acts for happy hour and killer bands on the weekends! Come see the best cover bands without a cover charge and don’t miss other special events with DJs, tribute bands and more!
